Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
Author: joshua o.
Title: Artist wife loves these
Body: My wife is an artist and uses these for street signs she makes for those who passed by to enjoy. She loves these chalk markers, if it isn't obvious from the amount of chalk boards she's used them on since purchasing these about 2 weeks ago. She had used other chalk markers in the past but absolutely hated them because they would leak down standing board which is how she has to draw large scale boards standing straight up, so it's important that the product she uses does not drain down into any work she has already put into the chalk board sign. Loddie Doddie Chalk markers do not seem to have many issues doing this, it did happen once with a neon color she used, but easily wiped up right away without causing issues to anything around it. She told me only 2 out of this pack had one explosion after shaking but probably the reasoning was more a user error considering they had sat in sun while she chalked on the beach.There are photos of how 3 different types of chalks look on a board, her reasoning for this is to show the difference in how they spread and visibility to others from a distance.  These markers are bold, bright, and definitely much more visible from a distance than the pastel chalks she uses to create the illustrations on board.As far as the erasing thing, okay so it will take some work, but don't all things worth while? First, understand your board must be seasoned,  which means if you have a brand new chalkboard use chalk and dust it up. I know its not new pretty anymore,but clean up is easier and staining is less likely. Use water and a rag, a little dawn soap doesn't hurt, if you are still having issues throw some white side walk chalk over the top and try the water again.My wife gives these two thumbs up and will be coming back for more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2019
Author: Cathy
Title: Please Ignore the Number 1 Star Reviews
Body: I was boarding 5 dogs.  I decided to get this cheap dry erase board at Five Below store that was black and came with a white marker to record who did number 1, 2, or both and the time.  It also said you could use fluorescent colors on the black, dry erase board.  They were also cheap, but thought I'd give them a try.  They hardly showed up.  The white one that came with the $5 board didn't work at all.  I purchased these, of course from Amazon.  I took the first one out of the box.  I was so excited to try it because the fluorescent purple (that was the easiest to see, hardly showed up).  I tried my first white one from Loddie Doddie.  It didn't work.  I was so, so bummed.  I thought "maybe they got too frozen" on the porch delivery and let them sit for a few hours in the house.  We shook it-there's a little bead inside.  It didn't work.  I was bummed again.  Then I thought that the first one just might be a "dud".  I took out the second one.  I shook it.  Nope, didn't work.  I basically thought, "This sucks!"  THEN, I read the directions (3 very simple steps) on the back of the box.  Hold it up vertically-yeah.  Shake it-I had already.  THIRD step direction, clearly written on the back of the box: Press tip for a few seconds until tip fills with ink.  Recap after each use..............I used my finger and pushed the tip for a second figuring yeah, yeah.  I tested a line on the black dry erase board and man, that white, bright ink came out slick as could be.  I was already set up for defeat, and then thought, Son of a ********.  They work beautifully.  I'm so glad I uh, "read the directions", which I always get on my husband for not doing-which I hadn't either.  I mean, who would have thought you needed to read directions for a marker?  I LOVE them.  I tried so hard to upload from my phone to the computer so that you could see the fluorescent compared to what I can see at a glance now.  PLEASE ignore the 1 star comments about none of them working.  They work beautifully and show up brightly if you follow direction step #3.  I feel badly for the seller receiving one star reviews when he or she does not deserve them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2024
Author: Cassidy White
Title: Decent with some flaws
Body: I bought these chalk markers to use on my chalkboard calendar.  I had read the reviews and thought they would be a great buy.  Overall, they are decent chalk markers and have great colors.  The downside to these markers is that some of the more neon colors seem to be watery and do not deposit color like they should.  This is mainly the bright pink and bright orange.  The pastel colors work great and deposit color like they should.  I have tried a couple methods to clean them off my chalkboard calendar and have found that it takes a lot to remove them.  I used to just use water and it seemed that you could still see where I had previously written.  I have also tried using windex and dawn to gently remove and neither option showed any real improvement.  When it comes to cleaning, you will have to dedicate time and effort to fully remove past writings.  That being said, the color lasts and once it has dried the colors remain vibrant and easy to see.  These markers are easy to use and overall a good quality with only a few drawbacks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2024
Author: Dell K.
Title: Great  chalk markers BUT......
Body: Loddie Doddie Liquid Chalk Markers are just what I needed for my monthly planner board. I was tired of the same 4 neon colors that I had to use over and over. But with these markers I can now create with every color of the rainbow and more. First, let's get the only CON out of the way... when first starting to use these, there are directions on the box to shake and tap for a few seconds to start the paint flow. Well, OMG! this made an absolute mess over and over with quite a lot of my pens. I kept trying to be gentle with each pen during the initial use. Keep paper towels handy! This made splatters and dime sized pools of paint come out. I cleaned all this up and after that ,the use of these pens were great.I love these pens! They are so easy to use. Clean up was a breeze with window cleaner. One swipe with a saturated paper towel and it was gone. You can saturate window cleaner on a microfiber cloth too, that also worked for me. When I got some on my hand I used simple soap and water on my hands to clean up easily. The colors are so wonderful. The photos of the metallic pen colors don't do true justice, they are amazing in person. I will repurchase these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
Author: Hannah
Title: For the most part gets the job done but is only "okay" quality....
Body: Although these markers aren't nearly as expensive as some other brands of liquid chalk (thus why I bought these), I was not too impressed with the quality of them. Although they mostly do the job, having a bold look to most of the colors and a good selection of colors (including some metallic looking ones), the markers themselves are pretty unreliable. The tips are reversible (one rounded side and one more of a squared off line), BUT on the ones I have flipped to the squared off side, nearly all of the tips resulted in uneven, unfilled lines and I ended up switching back to the rounded. Additionally, some of my colors (especially the neon ones) are so clear/liquidy that the pigment won't even show up and/or stick to the painted chalk board. Quite a few of the colors are also too dark to show up if you are using dark gray or black chalk board/paint. Lastly, when priming many of the markers, it will go from absolutely no liquid coming out to just a sudden, huge flow of liquid dripping everywhere.

The metallic colors also ran a lot and appeared watery and had to add an additional layer to get the pigment to show. Other colors had really good pigment

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Author: Disappointed customer
Title: Some colors come out very watery after initial use
Body: Have a family calendar chalkboard that we purchased these with which to use.  The initial use, the colors were very bright and vibrant.  Each marker was primed correctly and worked great.  When used again, there were a few colors (orange, red, pink, and blue) that came out extremely watery even after shaking.  I reached out to the manufacturer and they suggested to rinse out the tip with warm water and try to prime once again.  The picture included is what that looks like after the 2nd attempt.  The orange and red are still watery and look like they are dripping to the bottom of where the color was used.  Almost like the words are crying.  We will continue to give them a shot as there are a few colors that haven't been used yet.Added additional picture today. The orange, pink, and red have basically lost all their color and turned to water.

Great!Highly recommend

I use these every week, and now ordering a different set because i'm so frustrated trying to use these.. oh and a tip for the people who "can't get these off" just use al alcohol wipe. Even lysol wipes work amazing, its not that serious.

Author: Emily Lamphear
Title: I was hopeful
Body: Having done a chalkboard wall in my previous house, I wanted to do another one in my new house. I searched Amazon for a chalk pen set bigger than the one I‚Äôd used before, and came across these Loddie Doddie pens. I liked the color selection, and the few metallic ones. They were easy to set up for use, just like any other chalk pen. But, once I used them on my wall and then wiped it clean to write out the next month it left behind very noticeable chalk shadows. No amount of wiping or scrubbing has done anything to make the chalk shadows fade. The previous set I‚Äôd used by a different brand never left shadows as bad as this. I‚Äôll probably have to redo the entire wall again to get the shadows off. Also FYI: I took the picture about 4.5 feet away from the wall and you can very clearly see all the shadows that the pens left.

So that was a bummer bc when it does write on my dry erase black board it comes out really nice.I am having trouble keeping the liquid to appear bright on the board, the white shows up really good but the green tends to be really dark on the board. I've tried shaking it really good and still comes out dark. So the ink colors are a little inconsistent.Other than that the ink colors are really nice.

Author: Live Family
Title: Caution : Not Returnable
Body: I have a lot of experience with these types of pens. I have done many projects, chalkboards, wedding signs, Etc.Some of the pens were very dry and I could barely get any use out of them. Other pens would bleed an excessive amount of chalk paint when the tip was pressed to extract color. (I learned my lesson and did not do it on my project after that) . Basically, I had to press the pens on the equivalent of an artist palette and then use a paint brush - or the pen tip- to paint the color onto the chalkboard. I would not buy this item or brand again. Especially without a guarantee or ability to return.If you're still interested purchasing and wondering what colors come in this package, I'll give my best description. Be warned that a lot of the colors are bright and even Neon. Not what I had in mind but great if you are wanting to advertise something for sale, I suppose.Neon orange, neon green, neon yellow, neon pink, black, white, metallic gold, metallic silver, metallic purple, metallic blue, metallic light purple, forest green, sage green, bright mint green, bright aqua, bright light blue, another bright blue (not much different than the previous blue), bright baby pink, terracotta, deep orange-y red, brown, bright purple, bright red, and light lavender purple.My friendly advice is that you pass, but if you don't, then I wish you the best of luck!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2024
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Disappointed  - they did not come off
Body: I recently purchased the Loddie Doddie Liquid Chalk Markers with high hopes of adding creative designs to my chalkboard paint surface. However, my experience with these markers was far from satisfactory, ultimately leading to frustration and disappointment.Despite the promising description of being "perfect for chalkboards," these markers proved to be ill-suited for use on chalkboard paint. Upon application, I quickly noticed that the ink did not adhere well to the surface, resulting in uneven and patchy lines. Even after multiple layers, the colors appeared faded and lacked vibrancy, rendering my designs dull and unimpressive.To make matters worse, the so-called "dust-free" claim fell short of expectations. Instead of producing clean, crisp lines, the markers left behind a powdery residue that smudged easily, creating a mess that was difficult to clean up. Not only did this diminish the visual appeal of my designs, but it also made the surface look unkempt and unprofessional.In the end, my experience with the Loddie Doddie Liquid Chalk Markers was so disappointing that I had to resort to repainting my chalkboard surface entirely. Not only was this a waste of time and effort, but it also added an unexpected expense to my project.Overall, I cannot recommend these markers for use on chalkboard paint surfaces. Despite their claims of being suitable for chalkboards, they failed to deliver satisfactory results and ultimately proved to be a poor investment. If you're looking for reliable chalk markers, I would suggest exploring other options to avoid the frustration and inconvenience I experienced.

Author: Nikki
Title: Great concept, but needs work
Body: So I thought it was a great idea that the tip of each marker is double sided so that you can switch it and have two tip options. However, I think because of this, the flow of the ink is very unpredictable. I followed the instructions and shook the markers before each use, then pressed down on the tip until the ink started to flow. Unfortunately, I learned the hard way that you must shake the markers with the lid on because sometimes ink will fly everywhere. I also learned the hard way that if you press down too hard on the tip, it can get stuck, which is a huge mess. Another major problem I had is that sometimes, even when things seemed to be working ok, it would either suddenly put out way too much ink that would just puddle on my chalk board when I tried to write, or it would get kind of dry (even though I was writing with the tip pointing down) and I would have to press down on the tip again, which may or may not cause too much ink to come out again ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I did give them two stars instead of one because all the colors are nice, and when they did work properly, they wrote really nicely. Unfortunately though, if I hadn‚Äôt procrastinated and missed the return window, I would definitely be returning them.

Title: Beautiful, but stains
Body: I kind of hate that these are called chalk markers. They‚Äôre not great for any form of chalk board.They stained my wood paint chalk board, my spray paint chalkboard and my professionally cured chalkboard. It‚Äôs seriously irritating and while they go on pretty well despite some staying watery they mark up everything and I‚Äôve had to repaint my boards to work with wax chalk crayons instead.I really recommend just working with the window crayons for pretty doodles and blending. The markers are only good for less textured chalkboards where you want more permanent writing because it‚Äôs difficult to wash off.Getting them to work is a hassle too. I hate the transfer tipsBut anyway my chalkboard has a big red heart painted in the middle until I had to spray paint over it to get rid of the markings these markers made.

Some surfaces are not good for this chalk ink, you need something with a slick glossy surface like glass or laminated/sealed surface to not allow any residue to stay behind. Body: I thought my menu board was ruined, but I did come up with a method that works to remove it. I use steel wool ( like sos pad) that has been rinsed to remove the blue soap. Body: I was excited to use these liquid chalk markers for my chalkboard projects, and while some of the colors are bright and vibrant, others were disappointing. A few of the markers just don‚Äôt show up on the board at all, no matter how much I shake or prime them.The ones that do work look amazing‚Äîthey write smoothly and are easy to erase with a damp cloth. The reversible tips are also a great touch, giving me flexibility for different designs.If all the markers had worked consistently, I‚Äôd give this a higher rating. For now, it‚Äôs an okay set, but I wish the quality was more reliable.

Author: Kia Couture
Title: A little leaky
Body: I had high hopes for these to use on the family calendar but some of the colors are way too dim to use on a black chalkboard so they look super dim unless you to like 4 coats of the color. In addition to that they get really really leaky so if you don't lay whatever you're writing on flat until it's completely dry it'll start to drip and run and look messy no matter how light of a touch you use.Over lapping colors is super hard with these because the marker you use second picks up the pigments and drags them out of place. They get the job done but there's improvements that could be done for sure. They do come up really easily as long as you're using a wet cloth or tissue to wipe them up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
Author: Judy C
Title: Does not erase.
Body: The products (once you get the ink flowing) look fantastic and are very vibrant. However when trying to erase it simply does not. Just the white came off most of the way but there are still faded lines. There is an insert with the box that disclaims you must ‚Äúprime‚Äù chalkboard before use, otherwise staining will occur with no further instructions on how to prime. After google searching how to prime a chalkboard I used a regular piece of chalk to color all over the board and then wipe it off with a towel, it still stained. :( the picture shown is after 10 minutes of erasing using methods of scrubbing with wet papertowel, dry papertowel, coloring over with both a marker again and a piece of chalk then erasing. We will need to buy vinegar to see if water and vinegar will work to remove the chalk next per google instructions.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
Author: HaoleD
Title: Beautiful!
Body: These colors were vibrant and made a beautiful sign. I had initially thought I would not erase and keep this as a permanent sign. The kids had other ideas, and I knew they would end up coloring on it. After taking photos to preserve the memory, I thought I‚Äôd try and erase it. I didn‚Äôt hold out much hope as many reviewers said not to leave it on for an extended period of time. It has been on for five weeks and came off easily with four dried up alcohol wipes that were rewet with water. No prep was done to the board prior to decorating to ease the erasing as that wasn‚Äôt part of the plan. Very happy with this product. The colors had great longevity, were easy to remove, and came clean off of the board.  **Black censorship rectangle on top of photos.** The board is HBCY Creations Rustic Black Wooden Tabletop Chalkboard with Legs/Vintage Wedding Table Sign

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
Author: J.K. Dear
Title: Great company
Body: I never knew 2 things about chalkboards.#1 you need to season your chalkboard. Which is very easy.#2 these markers are better then chalk! I received these markers from this small business. They were easy to use and the colors vibrant. I did have two small issues. One marker was missing a tip and another pen was leaking when my husband was trying to use it. I emailed this company and explained I had a problem. Since i wanted to support a small business I didn‚Äôt want to send back the box because it wasn‚Äôt that big of a deal but if they had any suggestions for me. They emailed me back in a couple of days, (I sent the email on the weekend, so I didn‚Äôt expect to hear back until the next business day) they thanked me for the purchase and wanted to fix the problem right away. I was surprised and delighted that they actually sent a new box and as a bonus several of their new pens. They are really nice for writing on my whiteboard calendar. I would definitely support this company and recommend them, not just because they mailed me extras, but because their customer service is to be commended! And their products are really nice.  Thank you to this company. I hope, if the customer service personnel has a boss, they will know how pleased I am with this company.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
Author: John Fields
Title: Wow! Best marker for glass. Period
Body: So I have an Audio Visual Direct glass white board. Since the white surface is a ¬º" behind the writing surface, regular dry erase markers just don't work right.  These chalk markers stand out, pop!  Clear winner to me. See my comparison video for example.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
Author: Angelyce Ramirez
Title: 9/10Recommend
Body: I‚Äôm super picky when it comes to markers and pens. These were great. I bought them cause I saw someone else online had them and I trust her word & saw her actively using them.After buying them is when I saw the reviews. I got nervous. But like one of the people said if you follow the instructions and wait for the words to dry a few seconds you‚Äôre good. I did a test on what happens when I do the instructions and not. It started to look like the reviews. I drew circles in random spots to get the marker back to how it should be. It was a super easy clean up. No marks left behind EXCEPT the white one. It wasn‚Äôt vibrating more like a mini shadow left behind. I only used water to clean it up. But I‚Äôm sure if you use a Clorox wipe it will go away. I feel like I got my moneys well worth. I posted a video of me writing. It‚Äôs hard to write and record at the same time. I did a cleaning one too. But you can only post 1 video sorry :( it‚Äôs  massively easy tho. No scrubbing needed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
Author: Tony J Lajimodiere
Title: These work‚Ä¶ but‚Ä¶
Body: I bought these for my kids‚Äô first day of school chalkboards (pic 1). As the description mentioned, if you have a porous chalkboard it needs to be primed (pic 2). To do this, I used some broken random chalk I had at home and rubbed it anywhere I would use the markers. I wiped it off with a dry paper towel. Then I primed the markers on a blank sheet of paper. The green was fine but the purple, pink, and blue started leaking and dripping. I took another paper towel and wiped around the edge of the marker. After all the drips were cleared, we used them on the chalkboards and they worked perfectly!Moral of the story- do the prep work and have paper towel around. But, these are 100% worth the money. We had to wash off and retry several times and even after I forgot to clean these for the first WEEK of school, the ink came off easily when I got around to do it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
Author: Lauren
Title: Exactly what I was looking for!
Body: These are PERFECT!! Writes smoothly. Doesn‚Äôt smudge. Erases easily when you are ready to write again. Lids come on and off easily and reversible tips are also easy to trade out! Love the vibrant colors!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
Author: Cellie
Title: Prime before use
Body: Was really excited to find these here, and the price was good.  The colors are fantastic In my opinion. However, these are incredibly difficult to wipe off. I didn‚Äôt realize the instructions on the box that says that you should prime the board before using these. If you do decide to go with these definitely prime the chalkboard (whatever that means) Otherwise you‚Äôll probably have to use a stronger agent because a wet paper towel, a wet paper towel with Dawn, and vinegar did not work. I haven‚Äôt tried alcohol yet but I will because I cannot write/draw anything because there are so many layers already on the board.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2024
Author: TM Conway
Title: These are what you call "vibrant"
Body: These are HANDS DOWN, the best chalk markers I have ever owned (and I have bought 7 sets in the last year and a half). I always thought they were too pricey but since I got them during Prime Days & see how good they are, I won't mind paying the full price in the future.In my photos, the circlular cut is from a good board surface & the colors written in are on a cheap surface. It looks better on the good board but is still vibrant on the cheaper surface.PROS:They are so vibrant that they really stand out on the black background. Even the Blue and Purple which for some reason did not show up with the other sets I had.Even when the liquid is completely dry - like a day later - the colors are just as vibrant.They are easy to prime. Pro tip: if like me you prefer the slanted tip, do that before you prime the markers. That way, you don't get the color on your fingers!I am just so pleased with these that, unless they just don't last long enough, I will always buy this brand.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
Author: VYS
Title: For Acrylic Calendar
Body: Attaching picture in case anyone was looking for how these turn out on an acrylic board. It‚Äôs pretty vibrant if you let the color saturate the tip. I pushed the tip in and let it pop back out and shook it to get more color out. Don‚Äôt do that bc it lets too much out and there were drips of color on my floor. Maybe shake and have marker tips down and make sure ink is flowing. I would buy it again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
Author: Fear and Loathing in Loungewear and Manolo's
Title: An indispensable tool in my quest for visual excellence
Body: These chalk markers possess a mesmerizing vibrancy that breathes life into every stroke. With their water-based formula, they glide effortlessly across various surfaces, awakening a world of possibilities for both kids and adults alike. Whether you're adorning a blackboard, creating a masterpiece on a canvas, or letting your imagination run wild on a windowpane, these markers offer a vibrant feast for the eyes.One of their standout features is their reversible tips, which grant you the power to choose between fine and bold strokes. This versatility allows you to unleash your creativity with precision or make a bold statement that cannot be ignored. The markers respond to your artistic whims, adapting to your vision and breathing life into your creations.What truly sets these chalk markers apart is their erasability. With a simple wipe, your masterpiece can transform into a blank canvas once more, inviting you to embark on a new visual odyssey. The non-toxic, water-based formula ensures peace of mind, making these markers suitable for both aspiring Picassos and their younger counterparts.As I delve into the realm of artistic expression, I find solace in the vibrant hues that flow from these markers. They bring my ideas to life, infusing my creations with a radiant energy that transcends the ordinary. Whether I'm crafting intricate designs, making bold statements, or simply doodling to release my imagination, these markers never fail to inspire and captivate.To all the budding artists, visionaries, and dreamers, I implore you to seize these chalk markers and embark on a visual journey that knows no bounds. Allow their vibrant hues to ignite your imagination and let your creativity soar to new heights. With their reversible tips, water-based formula, and unwavering brilliance, these markers will become your trusted companions in the pursuit of artistic excellence.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2024
Author: Jae
Title: Super Great! Perfect and Bright! When Using as The Instructions Tell You!!!
Body: Don't be fooled by the negative reviews! I seen some poor reviews for these pens. I truly know now that these were stemmed from misuse. I used these on my car windows for a special celebration.  I loved them. They are bright and beautiful. I found that activating the pens with the push (just once) method, I'd pushed the pen down in a paper towel and no mess no fuss! They don't run. Don't write while pushing on the pen!!!!  You have to shake them a LOT as described in the directions. And when they say a lot... it's a LOT.  And you can hear them loosening up and mixing. They work perfect when shaken properly. And it comes off easy peasy! I will be back for more when these run out! Super fun and thank you!!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
Author: Tracy Jo
Title: Decent markers
Body: **Update 13 months of use** My original review stands true. I didn‚Äôt start using these regularly until 4 months ago and I write a monthly calendar with them to keep track of my schedule. 1 color I rarely use is already barely working unfortunately despite shaking and priming multiple times. The markers have always been kept in the box they came in and are stored upside down. I had hoped I wouldn‚Äôt have to prime them each time I wanted to write down a new appt quick but that‚Äôs not the case unfortunately. As you can see from the attached pic, I take care of them so it‚Äôs not like they are battered and bruised! Even though I‚Äôve had them for over a year, I would‚Äôve hoped they would‚Äôve lasted a little bit longer given the fact that I didn‚Äôt really start using them until recently. I‚Äôll be looking for a different for future use.The colors are good once you get the marker primed well. Some of the colors tend to be a little bit liquidy which makes it a little bit of a pain to get the chalkboard clean if you are particular like I am. I imagine there are better markers on the market yet these do work if you put a little extra effort into it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2024
Author: Bob A
Title: Fabulous
Body: These are awesome!  But keep in mind - they ‚Äúrun‚Äù.  So don‚Äôt overdue one spot.  Let it dry and go over it.  Great colors and easy to use.  I modge podged them after they dried.  Highly recommend!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
Author: Sarah
Title: Awesome!
Body: These are awesome markers! Very bright and colorful and easy to use! It can be difficult to erase if you don‚Äôt have proper erasing equipment however I learned that using a magic eraser works great! *It can get messy if you press down too hard*

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
Author: üëìA GEEK who loves read & shop.üõç
Title: My new favorites.
Body: UPDATE December 23, 2023The company reached out after my first review. Their customer is top tier and I definitely appreciate them for caring about their customers.I was sent a replacement marker set and they have been working amazing. I haven‚Äôt had any issues and they are so much more vibrant than the first ones. I believe I might have had a bad batch. Either way, I now love theseORIGINAL REVIEW:These liquid chalk markers don‚Äôt last long. I‚Äôve been using them once a week very briefly to write out my weekly home menu, and within the first few uses, quite a few of them are barely showing. It‚Äôs to the point now that I might have two that are actually dark and show up. I guess I‚Äôm on the hunt to find some that actually work for longer than a little while.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
Author: Jay Don
Title: Great, vibrant markers! Only 4 stars because one of them came with mold or something on it.
Body: These markers are great! They write beautifully and the color looks terrific, even after several days. Super easy to remove. The instructions are clear on how to use them (make sure you prep your chalkboard in order to avoid any residue being left over after erasing!). I would have easily given this product 5 stars, except the yellow marker came with mold or something on it (see photo). Not worth my time to return it, and for my use I don‚Äôt particularly need the yellow, but definitely a bummer!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2024
Author: Laura Wagner
Title: Very Vibrant Colors
Body: Very Vibrant, smooth to write with. Only issue is the orange doesn't seem to want to work (the ink won't come down into the tip) , but all the other colors do, so not that big of a deal (unless you're only buying for the orange one I guess).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
Author: Dee
Title: Love them
Body: Overall I gave them a four star but not really because they‚Äôre not good markers they‚Äôre awesome. My only complaint is that in order to switch the tips from round or flat tip to write with, you have to pull it out and switch it over at that point if you‚Äôve already been using the marker the liquid chalk gets all on your fingers. Also be mindful when you shake it to only do it at the beginning why the cap is on because if you shake it by the Is off then the liquid chalk will go everywhere other than that awesome markers I love them I will purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
Author: Katherine
Title: Easy to erase, beautiful colors!
Body: These chalkboard dry erase markers are easy to erase, with just a wet towel and don‚Äôt leave marks on anything you‚Äôve used them on, the colors are bold and stand out!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Author: Gina
Title: Markers are big! Not all colors are vibrant either, more sheer.
Body: These markers are just ok, will prob be fine to write on larger surfaces/boards, but not good for labels or small glasses. The tips are NOT in the shape of a chisel nor are theyangled, they are more rounded. Also needed to "prime" them to get color to come out, not a big deal but some require more "pumping" then others, and if you pump them too much, the writing is extremely wet and too thick - not good for precise, crisp writing. Also, not many of the colors were vibrant, they are more watery/sheer. Specifically, the red marker is extremely sheer and not a true red.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
Author: Jason ZHOU
Title: So beautiful colors
Body: I never painted with a water based chalk. I‚Äôm so happy with my first trial. The colors are so vivid. One tip is it will getting dry after a while so you need to shake it when the lines getting thinner to keep the lines consistent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
Author: Ady
Title: The colors were great but it ruined my chalk board :-(
Body: This product was easy to use and the colors looked wonderful however when I tried to add my other child‚Äôs info the chalk would not erase :-( So only one child out of three got a pretty board this year. The chalk erased easily while I was correcting certain things but once it was left on the board for a while it stained it. I typically don‚Äôt leave bad reviews without contacting the seller however I was unable to contact the seller through Amazon. The reviews I read before purchasing were mixed so decide to take my chances and now I regret it :-(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2024
Author: Pamela McLachlin
Title: Impressive!
Body: This product was wonderful. I love all the color options that it came with. The only one that didnt work the best was the pink (in the photo is the purple marker). I had this on my window for about 4 days. And today wipped it off with windex and a paper towel and it came off with ease! Highly recommended if this is what youre looking for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
Author: Colecat134
Title: Not bad, but smell funky
Body: These aren't bad - they were bought to replace the ones that came with my magnetic blackboard. The originals were vibrant, but were starting to dry up.I don't feel these are quite as vibrant as my old ones, but they write well and as you can see, the colors are solid. They do have a weird smell until they dry. Nothing overwhelming, but I kept getting a whiff of Powerbait (If you know you know). Once dried, they do wipe off easily.For the price and what you get, they're good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2024
Author: Zehra Naqvi
Title: Vibrant Chalk Markers: A Hit for Rock Art
Body: The vibrant chalk markers were a huge success with the youth during our rock art activity. The colors popped beautifully on the rocks, and everyone had a great time getting creative with them. Definitely a must-have for any art project!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2024
Author: Brandon & Rebekkah May
Title: Chalk Markers 8 Vibrant Erasable Non-Toxic
Body: While the Chalk Markers - 8 Vibrant, Erasable, Non-Toxic, Water-Based, Reversible Tips set initially appeared promising, my experience was less than satisfactory. Despite the vibrant colors advertised, the markers often required multiple layers to achieve the promised brightness, which was disappointing. Additionally, the erasability was not as seamless as expected, leaving stubborn residue on surfaces that claimed to be suitable for these markers. The reversible tips, while a unique feature, proved to be more cumbersome than convenient, frequently slipping out during use. Although the non-toxic and water-based qualities are commendable, the overall performance did not meet my expectations, especially considering their intended use by both kids and adults.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Author: Theresaclueless
Title: First set didn't work, but seller quickly sent replacement and they work great!
Body: The seller quickly sent a replacement set. I used them today to write a protest sign. Our neighborhood is voting to allow Giant Eagle to build a gas station where all of our town soccer fields are currently located. The 2nd set of markers made beautiful signs for our soccer club members!The first set I got: white marker has no paint tip and cannot be used. Also even after priming surface they will not wipe away. Glad I used a cheap dollar tree chalkboard. Orange is empty and has no paint

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
Author: mona
Title: Not erasable for me
Body: The colors are so beautiful bright and vibrant. I let my kids draw on this side of the board 2 days ago. Today, 8/27/22, I went to clean it and realized this is almost permanent. I am very disappointed that I will have to buy a new board‚Ä¶.and new markers. I was hoping it would work for me like the others reviews stated but nope‚Ä¶

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
Author: Priscilla Garcia
Title: They‚Äôre okay!
Body: The first photo is right after I opened the box & got some ink to the tip of each marker(round) So I gave it a couple days and tried again. The second photo (left=chisel, right=round) They are pretty smelly. Pros- chisel side colors are very pretty, chisel side doesn‚Äôt run. Cons- round side runs on some colors, some colors not very vibrant, they all give off an ugly odor.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
Author: mel
Title: Good product  great price but delivery was a flop
Body: The pens are nice bright colors, work well on the windows as you can see in my pictures...they were purchased to decorate our son's car for graduation, it cleans up very easily, comes out of clothing and the price is is great! ..but sadly I will not buy from this third party seller again. The site stated next day delivery on this item, that was not the case they sent it UPS and I got it 5 days later. Good product but falsely advertising delivery, I felt like I was shown that date just to buy and get suckered into waiting for it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
Author: Isabel Villa
Title: LOVE
Body: These are so awesome! They come off EASILY they don't stain and the color is great. The only color that isn't as vibrant is the red. You have to really get it going otherwise they're great.I left it on for about a month and they wiped right off. I added a drop of soap the spots that I had nicks/imperfections to get it out of the cracks and it came right out.All you really need is water and a napkin or rag.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024
Author: Dawnielu
Title: Vibrant Colors
Body: These chalk markers are awesome and fun to use. It is hard to find markers that perform the way you expect. These however were perfect and made the project enjoyable. They clean up easy too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
Author: Neyda Cruz
Title: Super vibrant!
Body: I love these I bought them for my display stand when going to my vendor events and its amazing!! the colors are extremely vibrant 10/10 love the reversible tips makes writing/drawing so effortlessly

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2025
Author: Tracy
Title: Very bright but don't last long
Body: These are exceptionally bright and crisp. However after a few uses, they no longer work. Sorry of like they dried up. I've found if you get the tip wet and prime the chalk you can get it to work again but they never seem to be as crisp after that .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2024
Author: Ahsvtw
Title: Dry up fast
Body: They work great for a couple of uses; however, they do dry out fast. If you have them upside down they last a little longer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2024
Author: Mikaela Laughlin
Title: Bright colors!
Body: Highly recommend these chalk markers, especially for their price point! Very easy to use, last quite a while, depending on what you‚Äôre using them for. The quality and design are as expected and work very simply. The color of the chalk markers are bright and vibrant. The color simply washes off with a wet rag if you make a mistake or want to change up your project, very easy to clean and erase when needed. Highly recommend, especially for the value and variety of colors!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Product so awful I HAD to write my first review ever!!!!!!
Body: Typically I don't bother writing reviews bc I'm too lazy toü§∑üèºThis product is SO AWFUL that I feel it is necessary to, so I can warn other folks in the hopes of deterring them from purchasing this garbage!!! With the exception of two markers, every other one in the package was a leaky mess. Even after following the directions on the package properly. Stained my daughter's clothing and the upholstery and one of our chairs when we were simply writing with them, or attempting to for that matter. I CANNOT wrap my head around the fact that they are the #1 selling product of its kind thru Amazon. Total TRASH. Absolutely not worth ANYTHING, let alone almost $8!!!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2022
Author: Brooke M.
Title: Great chalk markers
Body: I've been through a lot of brands of chalk markers at my now former employer. We fought with so many different ones, never getting all of the colors to work. If we did they would cause other problems like spewing the ink everywhere or the tips wouldn't saturate properly so it was like they were dried out.Although these are not perfect, they have worked the best out of all the chalk markers I've tried. All of the colors worked, and they didn't spew ink everywhere. Some of the colors did have the issue where it was like they were dry. So it was hard to get them to write smoothly. I'd have to pump ink out and kinda spread it around with the marker rather than actually being able to write with it. This was after using them a few times so I don't know if ink may have dried on the tips causing them not to absorb and spread the inks. Other than that though they worked really well. The colors are really pretty and vibrant.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
Author: Caruby
Title: Love these
Body: So I bought these to use at work.  I work in freight and sometimes we have to write on a piece of metal or hard plastic. I've used permanent markers & china markers (white hard wax pencils) but I find they are sometimes hard to see. I wanted something that the customer could easily wipe off once their freight arrived but was BRIGHT enough that my dockworkers could read the instructions on without having to squint or worry about lighting.  These do the trick. You can lick your finger and wipe it clean off. Just water removes it perfectly. And they stayed on one piece that got hit directly with rain and didn't look worse for wear. So if you're looking for something bright neon that has pow and stays in place until you want it gone, these are it.  They do tend to feather if you're writing on something pourous like untreated wood or a bubbly plastic, but on metal, concrete, and cardboard they are good. Cardboard you will need to write over it twice, but that's to be expected. I use these daily & have even had a few "borrowed" by coworkers who loved my idea to use these instead of a Sharpie. And they last for a good long time. Definitely plan to buy again once I run out of colors.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2024
Author: Julie
Title: DO NOT BUY!
Body: THESE DO NOT FULLY ERASE! I tested it out and wrote on the chalkboard and then wiped it away and it came off. And then I wrote it again and waited today and the next day it did not come off and I have writing all over my chalkboard that‚Äôs not going to come off now. So now I don‚Äôt know what to do, these are the worst  do not buy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2024
Author: Maggie
Title: Horrible
Body: these markers are horrible. i have had them for a few weeks now and they have not once performed well. every time i use them i end up giving up because they have absolutely no ink or pigment or whatever. i did everything i could to try and "activate" them ‚Äì followed all the directions to shake them and spin them and twist them and whatever else it wanted me to do, but nope. no success. i have decided i am not going to waste any more time trying to make these work, because i have already wasted enough and its just not happening. i hate having to waste money, but i am going to have to toss these out and just buy a different set of markers. disappointing because the reviews seemed great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2024
Author: Shandelle
Title: Disappointed
Body: As you can see by the image I posted, these markers are pretty difficult to use. First time I used them, they worked great (that‚Äôs when I wrote the 27). I had an appointment to get my motorcycle license so I went to add it to my calendar, following the instructions on how to get the markers to work and it was either not coming out at all or it was coming out too liquidy. I had erased and tried to rewrite it at least 15 different times (that‚Äôs why the background looks so smudged). This is probably the best I‚Äôve got it. It‚Äôs just really frustrating at this point.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
Author: Ruovas
Title: Too much liquid,  not enough chalk
Body: While these chalk markers helped me to illustrate the message that I was writing, this time, it's really quite annoying when the marker starts to drip off of what you are writing on as soon as you hang it up. Or worse, when it drips down my refrigerator door after writing a message for my kids on the message board hung there. Didn't think to take a pic before I cleaned up that mess. This brand is awful. Going back to my usual brand of Chalkola. They've never disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
Author: Monique
Title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
Body: I loved the colors but it left the marks on the chalk paper. Wish they had something less stainable. I guess the bright side is that if you get it on the wall or floor it easily removes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
Author: MarZo
Title: Cheap & Messy
Body: These markers are easy to use, but I had to throw 2 of them out after using them only ONE time on a small chalkboard. The top part of the marker became loose after I took the cap off and now if I try to use it, the paint goes everywhere. The box tells you to push the marker down on paper to activate the paint, and when I did that with a different marker the tip got stuck and it won‚Äôt come out. The colors are nice but I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this product due to the low quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Moldy tips
Body: A couple of the tips came moldy. The ones that came how they should worked great! But glad i noticed before i let my kids play with the markers!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
Author: Maddy C.
Title: Good product
Body: These are good markers but they dry out too quickly I got them back in September and and it‚Äôs now November. Although they are vibrant and have good pigment they don‚Äôt last long.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
Author: Melody
Title: Great marker set - BUT don't use them on chalkboard paint!
Body: These markers work very well, they're nice and bright, and they're easy to use.  Ink starts fairly quickly once you start depressing the tip.  The chalk ink flows really well in most of the markers, making writing on the chalkboard effortless even if the chalkboard isn't the smoothest.  I love these and would definitely buy them again.EDIT:  These do not erase completely on chalkboard paint.  I didn't realize this when I bought them and wish I'd known.  Now I need to either repaint my custom made menu stand, or find a new chalkboard surface for it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
Author: Elizabeth
Title: Color dependent quality for clear use
Body: I shook the markers prior to use. The lines I drew flat, one strip of each color, then a few of pink and blue to show the pigment doesn‚Äôt really build. When I put it upright the pink dripped. But the green is vibrant and easy to read as is a few of the others.The last photo are things I actually wrote. Zoomed in it‚Äôs easier to see the blue than in real life.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
Author: Kara
Title: Would buy again
Body: I love these markers. They are very vibrant. They write very clean. I didn't clean off my board for a good 2 months and it still wiped away easily without any staining. You do need to be sure to shake them well before use or they come out a little watery and less vibrant. It takes a second for them to dry so you need to work top to bottom so you don't smear the chalk. I gave 4 stars because my purple marker was extra leaky and a bit messy. I had to clean it up and write soft and quick so it didn't spill all over my board. But it was manageable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
Author: Lauren0925
Title: No Yellow Marker
Body: Although the product came very quickly and happy with the price, I was disappointed when I received two blue markers and no yellow. I still plan on using the markers but will have to purchase a yellow one for the future

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
Author: Aimee Atwell
Title: Nice
Body: They write and feel nice. So far easy to wipe off with some cleaner.  I got two blues instead of a white though which kind of sucks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
Author: Kristin S
Title: Bright colors and Erases easily!
Body: Vibrant colors! I drew directly on the refrigerator, on glass and on the microwave door. It came off easily with a paper towel. I posted a pic of my fridge "art". Fun for all ages!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2024
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great chalk msrkers
Body: Follow the directions that state shake well before use and press down on marker to let color flow down the pen. Once complete, your markers will be bright and precise! Colors do not run and very easy to wash off and have the board look brand new! Even after leaving this outside for a couple days with morning dew the writing was still perfect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
Author: Rachel163735
Title: Better Than Expected
Body: These are way better than I expected and amazing! The colors are vibrant. I like that the tip is reversible. While I was just testing them out for my classroom on my personal chalkboard, they turned out so well! I would buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
Author: TD
Title: AWESOME product!
Body: Press the tip CAREFULLY, slowly. Otherwise it's too much, too fast. EASY clean-up!! Just with water.  BRILLIANT colors, dries quickly, will not smudge once dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
Author: Accountant by day
Title: Vibrant colors
Body: I purchased these chalk markers to replace a pack I quickly purchased from a store in my home town. The pack I purchased at that store was very disappointing, but these liquid chalk markers were so much better! Comparatively, they were much brighter, the colors were vibrant, and "popped" on the black background. The colors stayed vibrant even after drying and I did not have to press really hard to make them work. I used a damp paper towel to clean them off (even after fully drying) and had no issues with staining. The only negative I see is the markers can be very wet... sometimes a lot of liquid comes out at one time. I think that's part of what makes them look so good though, so it wasn't a major issue.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2024
Author: Jessie Lirios
Title: Some colors are great
Body: Some of the colors are great - they're write smoothly, they stay on and wash off well. Some of them are pretty faded (like, unusable because you can't see them), and come off without being wiped off.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
Author: Megan Hopwood
Title: If I'd known these existed, I'd have used my chalkboard more
Body: Overall great markers. I'm a lefty, so I have to be very careful because it's easy to smudge everything as I write.All of the colors came.out very bright and vibrant except the blue, which I was disappointed in. Otherwise, work very well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Sucky markers
Body: Initially I really liked the markers. They were bright and I liked the interchangeable tip. However 2 months later and the markers are COMPLETELY dried out even though they have been stored in a dry place away from sunlight and other factors that could dry them out. They‚Äôre super watery and fade onto the chalkboard (the ones that still work)I would not purchase these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2024
Author: Erika Gutierrez
Title: May work for others, not for me
Body: Have tried many brands over the years. This one disappointed me. Shook this marker for about 5 minutes, held down the tip for multiple seconds, pumped the tip and still works as you see in the video. Will not purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
Author: Megan Lepp
Title: Not good
Body: Doesn't work. All the color pools to the bottom of the letters and barely shows above. My previous markers (from a different brand) did not do this. Disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
Author: lee anne watson-test
Title: Works the first time, then nothing

Author: Casey Kimbro

It must have been a dud, it‚Äôs almost like its too watery and doesn‚Äôt have enough pigment making it look brown instead of vibrant orange. Otherwise the rest of these markers write beautifully so far!! They‚Äôre very fun to work with!Also I swatched the black on top of the dried white paint swatch since I have a black chalkboard. The formula doesn‚Äôt like that apparently though because it caused the black layer to bubble up and flake off. I‚Äôm not sure if that‚Äôs usual/common with chalk markers or not, this is my first time with this medium.My only wish for these markers is for them to be labeled or numbered so they‚Äôre easier to differentiate since some of the colors are close to each other, but that‚Äôs my personal preference.

It might take a few wipes to completely remove all residue from the chalk markers. They scraped off a bit when touched so I had to touch up the writing on my chalk board from time to time, but that can be expected when I'm transportation the chalk board often.

Author: Mgian
Title: Vibrant colors
Body: I bought several to go with gifts - two for myself (one set for work, one for home). You must prep the markers by removing the cap and pressing the point into the marker to puncture the internal ink sack - and release the ink to the marker tip. One set the ink was slow to fill the tip. I had to depress the tip several times and shake the marker to bring the ink down. One set the ink came running down really quickly. I guess you have to be careful. If you use chalkboard paint, these markers will not erase. I bought blackboard/dry-erase paper (self-adhesive) to write on and need to use a wet cloth to erase this ink. Colors are vibrant when the ink has fully filled the tips. I did have to double mark some lines to make the ink brighter when they were first opened. Overall a nice product - you just have to make sure you're using them on the right type of surface.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2025
Author: JW
Title: Bright and Fun Chalk Markers
Body: I recently tried these Chalk Markers and was quite impressed with their vibrant colors, ease of use, and versatility. Whether on glass, chalkboards, or other non-porous surfaces, they write smoothly and dry quickly, making them great for kids, businesses, or creative projects.Pros:‚úÖ Brilliant Colors ‚Äì The shades are bold, bright, and really stand out, making them perfect for menus, decorations, or DIY crafts.‚úÖ Reversible Tips ‚Äì The ability to switch between a fine point and a chisel tip adds flexibility, making it easy to write neatly or create artistic designs.‚úÖ Erasable & Non-Toxic ‚Äì The water-based formula wipes off easily from non-porous surfaces with a damp cloth, and it's safe for kids to use.‚úÖ Good Value ‚Äì For an 8-pack, the price is reasonable considering the quality and color vibrancy.Cons:‚ùå Not Always Erasable on Porous Surfaces ‚Äì These markers work great on glass and chalkboards, but if used on porous materials (like some painted chalkboards), they may leave a stain. It's best to test on a small area first.‚ùå Priming Takes a Bit of Effort ‚Äì Before first use, you need to shake and press the tip down several times to get the ink flowing, which can be slightly tedious.‚ùå Ink Flow Can Be Inconsistent ‚Äì While generally smooth, some markers may release excess ink or require extra shaking to maintain even flow.Final Verdict:Overall, these chalk markers are a fantastic option for vibrant, temporary designs on the right surfaces. While they have some minor drawbacks, such as priming time and potential staining, they are still a great choice for businesses, artists, and families looking for colorful, erasable markers.

Title: Lovely and vivid colors!
Body: I would have rated five stars but the blue marker I received is defective and not usable.The chalk markers are easy to use, just follow the directions and prime the chalkboard with traditional chalk first so it doesn't stain your board.The colors are bright and vibrant, making them easy to see! They're easy to use and cleaned up well since I primed the new chalkboard surface.I used them on a back to school chalkboard for photos and love the results!10/10 recommend. Great buy!

Still can see the outline, but very faded.Won't buy these again for our application. Only use on a true chalkboard and see if you can remove it within 2 days (?)

Title: Vibrant and easy to apply on car windows
Body: Vibrant colors that apply easily with almost no drip or mess. We used these to decorate car windows for graduation. Highly recommend for car window decorating. Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2019
Author: Jassmin
Title: It ruined my blackboard
Body: When I bought these markers, I was excited to use them for my blackboard. I seen many great reviews about the color vibrancy and the longevity of the markers. When they finally arrived, I immediately put them to use. I was first amazed on the brightness of each of the colors. I tested them out in a section of my own board and came out nice and, at first, cleaning it wasn‚Äôt a problem based on their video instructions. I continued using my board as one of my ways to communicate my partner on my work schedule and who fed our dog since we have completely opposite working schedules. A week has passed by and it was time to change the dates and comments that I previously wrote on the broad that week. I followed the cleaning process that THEY PROVIDED for the blackboards. First, it was extremely difficult to clean compared to the first time that I used the markers and cleaned it with the fresh ink. I had to sit and thoroughly clean the board in the same spot over and over again, but it never looked 100% clean because it literally left a cast that if you see it at an angle, you can clearly tell what I wrote. Secondly, it took away the black chalkboard paint off my board. At first I thought it was my own fault but I realized that I applied the same amount of pressure everywhere on my board, and only specific colors were taking the chalk paint of the board away. I had this board for well over a year and used so many other products and never had an issue up until this point, so the fact that it LITERALLY RUINED MY OWN PRODUCT was very upsetting. In summary, it might be good for short time uses or items that you know you won‚Äôt use/erase again, but not for using it on a weekly basis. I won‚Äôt use it again and will in fact be returning this item.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019

But my mistake was a good one because we‚Äôve been using them for finer crafts and projects instead..and they‚Äôre so much more fun!The girls use them to write on our windows and sliding glass/storm doors. These work on whiteboards and wipe off easily. And the colors are so vibrant and fun!!The only thing I want to ‚Äòwarn‚Äô about is...have an adult activate  the color. It takes a little time tapping on the tip, letting it press up into the marker so that the ink flows. It can get messy when kids do it (& can also make one think the marker is out of ink. it‚Äôs not!).Supposedly you can change the tips, too, but I haven‚Äôt explored that and I assume doing so would be quite messy, so we are keeping it the way it comes.

It ended up oozing out clear liquid but it I ended up shaking it more and it got more pigmented.Over all if you are on a budget I strongly recommend these but if you can afford to spend a little extra or you are looking for a professional product or super good product then maybe look for something else.My rankings:Red: 8.5/10Blue: 10/10Purple: 10/10Yellow 5/10Orange: 9/10Pink: 10/10Green: 10/10White: 9/10

Title: From great to HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!
Body: When I first received this product I was so excited because I had just bought a chalkboard from Michael‚Äôs for my daughter‚Äòs birthday. When I used them they‚Äôre bright, vibrant, go on easy and dry quickly. The board looked great! But the downfall came a couple days after her birthday party when I was trying to clean it off. I‚Äôve tried a water with a rag I‚Äôve tried to use a BabyWipe but I‚Äôm at a loss and don‚Äôt know how to remove this. I have even resorted to trying to scrape some of it off with my fingernail and it still leaves a little bit of a shadow of a letter that was there . Now I might have to buy a new chalkboard which I‚Äôm very upset about because this was supposed to be reusable for future birthdays.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022

Title: Orange is useless in less than a month.
Body: Have had these less than a month. Right from the start they weren't the greatest thing ever but they got the job done on my glossy menu refrigerator magnet however the orange was a problem almost right away. It seemed thinner and less bold than the others and you could see the black background though the chalk but now only a week since the last time I used it, it stopped working almost entirely as demonstrated in the video.Right now the orange is the only one with a big issue but my pink is starting to show the same signs so I have little hope for the longevity of this set. The caps have been kept tightly on in between uses so there is no way they should be dying out. I would return it but I already tossed the box and I see no opinion to contact the seller for a replacement. My next set will definitely be a different brand.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
Author: Crystal Beauparland
Title: Doesn't Come Off
Body: So I bought these for my blackboard because I hate the feel of chalk and I was super excited when they arrived. I followed the instructions and when I pressed on the tip a whole bunch of the liquid came out everywhere. I was like okay it's new maybe it takes some time to act normal. I gave it a day or 2 and tried to use it and there was so much liquid coming out of it that it was a tad bit runny, but I was trying to be optimistic. I wrote some things out and let it dry and when I tried to remove it about 2 days later it would not come off of the board fully. I even tried soap and water and that didn't work. So now I'm left with a permanent list on my board and cannot use it anymore. I am sadly disappointed. So if you're looking for something permanent to use, these are it, if you're not then don't waste your time or money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
Author: Leah D.
Title: Vibrant & Versatile - Bold Chalk Markers
Body: The first thing that struck me about these markers was the brilliance of the colors. The set includes a fantastic array of vibrant hues that truly stand out on any surface. Whether you're creating eye-catching signage for your business or adding a pop of color to your home decor, these markers deliver stunning and bold results.What sets these chalk markers apart is their ease of use. The liquid chalk flows smoothly and evenly from the nib, allowing for precise and controlled writing or drawing. And when it's time to make changes or start anew, erasing is a breeze.These Bold Chalk Markers are non-toxic and odor-free, making them safe for all ages. They're perfect for family activities, classrooms, or any environment where you want to encourage creativity without worrying about harmful fumes.In conclusion, Bold Chalk Markers are a fantastic addition to any creative toolkit. Their bold and bright colors, ease of use, versatility, durability, and safety features make them a top choice for anyone looking to add a splash of color to their projects. Whether you're a business owner, teacher, artist, or DIY enthusiast, these markers are sure to impress. I wholeheartedly recommend Bold Chalk Markers for chalkboards, signs, and all your creative endeavors!

Author: Barbara
Title: Mostly a Successful Purchase!
Body: The markers that do work, work wonderfully! The colors are vibrant and very saturated; they dry in a couple minutes and wipe off my board super easily with water (read the instructions tho)! With one exception: there‚Äôs something wrong with the middle orange marker in the pic of all the flowers (don‚Äôt ask me why I ended up drawing crummy flowers to swatch these). It must have been a dud, it‚Äôs almost like its too watery and doesn‚Äôt have enough pigment making it look brown instead of vibrant orange. Otherwise the rest of these markers write beautifully so far!! They‚Äôre very fun to work with!Also I swatched the black on top of the dried white paint swatch since I have a black chalkboard. The formula doesn‚Äôt like that apparently though because it caused the black layer to bubble up and flake off. I‚Äôm not sure if that‚Äôs usual/common with chalk markers or not, this is my first time with this medium.My only wish for these markers is for them to be labeled or numbered so they‚Äôre easier to differentiate since some of the colors are close to each other, but that‚Äôs my personal preference.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Updated review..... fantastic customer service
Body: These markers and challenge you to make smooth lines but it's the nature of the product not a flaw by the manufacturer.  I was refreshing a movie marquee and, in the picture shown, the yellow was an overlay of the existing pattern.  The dotting was a function of a previous marker (and different marker style) but the reason I gave only 3 stars was because I didn't even have enough ink to completely cover the old sign markings.  You can see that I ran out without finishing and thoroughly covering the yellow circle surrounding the "Cat Ballou" movie title.  Otherwise, these are a good product with sharp color which arrived quickly after I placed the order.Wow!  These folks contacted me without being asked and refunded my entire $$ even though I was not entirely displeased.  Customer service was fantastic and I'm impressed with their desire to please the customer!!!

Title: FABULOUS VIBRANT MARKERS

So four days later - our car is still decorated and still looks great.  I do think that rain would wash this off fairly quickly (not tested).  Keep that in mind if looking to use outside.  The colors are vibrant and the markers were easy to use.  Had a few runny spots at the beginning, but once we figured out how hard (or not) to press there were no problems.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
Author: Nicole P
Title: DOES NOT COME OFF
Body: I used them on a chalkboard I've had. When I wiped it off the next day, the lettering remained. I scrubbed, used cleaners, and still could not get the chalk pen completely off. I did some reading on what others did and tried to fix it. I bought some Benjamin Moore Chalkboard paint and put on 3 coats.  I then seasoned my chalkboard rubbing chalk long way over the entire board and just used my eraser to wipe it off. Then tried the pens again and they won't come off! Now I have to paint the chalk board again!! These chalkboard pens will ruin your chalkboard.

Body: FINALLY found neon pens that actually pop on my blackboard! After wasting $$$ on streaky brands, these deliver bold, consistent lines every time.  I use them daily doing tech architecture diagramsPROS:- VIBRANT COLORS: Neon shades show up clearly on dark surfaces.- LONG-LASTING: Survived 3 months of daily use in my home office... as long as I CAP THEM.- NO SKIPPING: Ink flow stays smooth once you prep them right.CONS:- HIGH MAINTENANCE: Gotta shake + click the tip 3-4 times before first use. Forgot once = sad faint lines.- NOT FOR LAZY CAPPERS: Let them dry out once, and they‚Äôre toast.CLEANING TIP (via Reddit wisdom):1. Wipe board with isopropyl alcohol (90%+)2. Scrub gently with microfiber cloth3. Let dry 2 mins before rewriting

Body: I got these for my fridge calendar. Most worked perfectly, but some of them pool up and make what you‚Äôre writing look weird. All of them eventually dry well enough that it doesn‚Äôt smudge, and they all wipe away fairly easily. I‚Äôm very happy with how bright all of the colors are. There are two tip options if you pull the tip out and turn it around. I would think that is a messy process once they‚Äôre full of ink. I left mine on the regular marker tip. It writes a bit thick, but it‚Äôs still small enough to write in the small boxes. I‚Äôm happy enough with these markers. I may try another brand in the future just because of the way some colors do that weird pooling thing while others don‚Äôt. Like too much ink is coming out at once. Title: Bright colors
Body: Great markers for car windows. Easy to apply. Make sure you don‚Äôt have rainX on the window because we didn‚Äôt think of it until after we applied the markers. Much easier if your windows are clean without rainx haven‚Äôt cleaned the windows but I will put an update once we do.UPDATE- we washed the car and the markers washed out beautifully and very easy. Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
Author: Nicholi
Title: Bright, Vivid
Body: I bought these to use on a glass marker board I use in my office as traditional dry erase markers don‚Äôt write as vividly on glass as they do on regular markerboards.The markers do solve that problem, but created another. These erase more like traditional chalk on old school markerboards, leaving the residue behind when you erase them. A normal markerboard eraser quickly fills up and begins to leave residue behind.  Fairly frequently, you need to beat the eraser to free it of the chalky residue - reminds me of grade school cleaning erasers.Probably great if you don't change the writing on your board much, but I use mine all the time and don‚Äôt like the extra cleanup.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
Author: Bernal Rodriguez
Title: Great markers for glass, very bright and catchy...but...beware of the pressurized contents!
Body: Our company offices have glass walls, with these markers we have floor to ceiling drawing boards.  Colors are great: bright and colorful. But before first use, read below:*** PRESSURIZED CONTENTS - A MESS:I followed instructions and shook them and then pressed the tips trying to draw something: I got an explosion of pigment all over the place, it was a mess...By pure accident, I found out that the tips keep the liquid under pressure and as soon as you press down while trying to mark a surface, the pressure comes out with liquid.***THE SOLUTION:Before you start shaking and pressing down to bring the ink out, open the tip while the marked points UP and press down with the cap:  you can hear the hiss of pressure escaping!  After you do that, then shake well and press down to bring the ink out as instructed and everything works perfectly!***CLEANING:Use water and only water: I tried to clean drops with alcohol wet wipes and that mixture makes almost permanent ink, impossible to clean.  Use only a moist paper towel to remove it from surfaces.Other than that, I loved the markers, colors are bold and saturated and very bright, perfect for glass!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
Author: Allison Blessington
Title: Great buy!
Body: I used these markers for both of my kids back to school chalkboard sign.  I loved the fine point of the marker. It allowed for more precision. I have used thicker markers that left more of a mess along with me, constantly wiping and rewriting.  The colors are great although I felt the purple was hard to see when I photographed my daughter.  My favorite part I think is the easy cleanup. Again, I have used other brands of markers that were thicker and hard to wipe off my chalkboard.  With these markers, I easily wet the board and wipe with a dry paper towel.  Other brands I had to literally scrub and still couldn‚Äôt get off. If you want a fine point marker with easy cleanup, these are by far the best!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020

Title: They are so bright
Body: I love this. I bought two sets. One for work and One for home. Bold, super vivid colors. Kids love it. I have only one problem. Although the tip stays wet for a least a couple words, every time you dip the tip So the ‚Äòink‚Äô can come out,  a whole pool of liquid comes out and it does is a freaking mess. In your hands in the floors, anywhere it touches it will do a pool of liquid chalk. I have tried several different ways to do it, and I haven‚Äôt gotten lucky. At the same time, I worry that how much can it last when every time you need ink, half of it comes out? Other than that, I really love them, but I will try others.

Then went to erase and Lo and behold, wouldnt work. I checked the little ‚Äúhelpful tip‚Äù they provided in the box, and the QR code link was useless. It took me to a Facebook messager chat, not a video like the information implied.Started to panic and getting ready to write a scathing review, I began trying various items I had around the house to see if that worked. Windex helped a bit but the miracle device is‚Ä¶Magic Clean Erasers! Wiped it all off with no troubles.After discovering this helpful trick, I‚Äôm back to loving this product. And would recommend!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
Author: Joni
Title: Smears too easily; point hard to write with
Body: I use chalkboard pens to mark Mason jar tops with leftovers in my fridge - use them to track dates of when the items were made. I also have chalkboard tape I use the chalkboard pens with for the same purpose. The pens I used in the past were perfect for the job. Ordered these, and they've been a real pain. The color gets on everything it touches. The "ink" never stabilizes the way that other chalkboard pens I used did - it's as if it remains actively wet forever, and when I move jars around in my fridge, I find it on my hands afterward; I've found it on food I've taken out of my containers that somehow bumped something the "ink" had gotten on. Also, the tip on these pens is rounded in a way the other pens I used were not, so it's hard to get a nice fine edge for good-looking writing. Less control in the shape of the letters because of the way the pen tip is shaped.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
Author: MXDawn
Title: Bright, Bold, and Easy
Body: Just got and used them today, and I‚Äôm impressed! I‚Äôve used the Expo Neon window dry erase before on my black dry erase board and been pretty happy but they are no where near as bright as these. I‚Äôm sure for other projects the dry erase will be easier to use, so I got a new set of those also, but for projects like this, where you really want the words to pop in pictures, these chalk markers are superior! When priming for the first time I did have an issue with the blue ink ‚Äúblowing out‚Äù with the first pump (2nd picture), so for all the other colors, I turned the tip up for the first pump and you could hear a pressure release, then 3-4 pumps with the tip pointing down and I got color without any mess. I used the plastic wrap the pens came in to prime into. I‚Äôm sure getting my board clean will be more work than dry erase but my words are also not being erased by little fingers so easy during pictures!
