Author: Lizz
Title: Pretty decent for the price
Body: Ive had these markers about 5 months now and i use them on a chalkboard i painted on my wall but here's my opinion.Pros:‚óèThey are bold, bright, and very pretty colors‚óè they seem to last a while‚óèno streaks, draws on nice and smooth‚óèhas two different tipsCons; (from my personal experience)‚óèthe pink one dripped a lot when used‚óè two of them barely worked since I got them (the orange and red)‚óèthe white one is starting to dry out but to be fair that could be my faultAll in all these are alright and I'd most likely buy them again. They do leave behind stains, but a magic eraser seems to do the trick and made my board look brand new. would rate it 5 stars if the red and orange worked better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
Author: Honest Opinion
Title: Nice Bright Colors! Leaves residue on Mirrors...
Body: I liked the vividness of these colors! I used them on my bathroom mirrors and they came off with Windex. Unfortunately, I noticed a slight residue and can still see the outline/shadow of certain letters in certain lighting. Will not be continuing to use on mirrors, but maybe something else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2020
Author: Michelle
Title: Definitely Buy These!!!! Great Product & Rich Color
Body: I wish I could give it MORE stars. Excellent Product. I bought to decorate vehicles because daughter is turning 16 in quarantine and wantEs to make it ‚Äúfun‚Äù best I could.  Very easy to clean if you make a mistake. Word of caution as you press down on top for more paint to flow don't press hard. I did that and some paint ran but it was my fault. Doesn‚Äôt do that under normal pressure. I was easily able to clean up & continue writing.  When writing if the chalk paint dries it is hard to go over. Go in one direction for best success. I‚Äôm kinda a perfectionist at times. I just got consumed in my project (lol). I decorated 3 vehicles and it is very durable and holds up nicely. 8 vibrant, rich & Beautiful colors.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
Author: AnneMarie
Title: DO NOT USE ON A CHALKBOARD!! Impossible to remove.
Body: Beyond difficult/impossible to remove from chalkboards. I used these to chalkboard labels to label food for a party and some of them (the white & blue colors) came off super easily. The pink is impossible to remove. I chalked this up to letting it sit too long on the labels before trying to erase them (~1 week) but I also used these on my pregnancy board and tried taking it off under 24 hours later to no avail. I tried hot water, soap, vinegar, windex. NOTHING WORKS. what finally did remove the color (but not the imprint stain of the writing on the board) was a bunch of windex with about 20 mins of scrubbing with a magic eraser. These markers says CHALKBOARD on them and while I love their brightness and the ease of writing, I would never recommend these to someone to use WITH A CHALKBORD. VERY DISAPPOINTED.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
Author: Charitie Bolling Tosuner/ Martha Simmons
Title: Not bad not not so good either
Body: Bought these for my childrens bedroom., painted entirely in chall board paint. They loved them as did i. the color was vibrant  snd very colorful.  they were awesome until it came time for cleaning.  they didn't easily wipe off as described, instead we ended up scrubbing the walls with an ammonia based cleaner.  in conjunction to the intense  cleaning, they  stained the blue wall so badly  we had to have it painted over. If the cleanup wasn't so bad  i would definitely  purchase again. in the meantime were going to stick with good ol fashioned sidewalk chalk!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
Author: KayJ
Title: Have papwer towel handy when writing
Body: I love the vibrant color in these markers! You do have to shake them, press the tips, and then wipe the excess (oil?) from them before writing. I use these for my fridge calendar and have to let the ink dry before hanging it back on the fridge or the ink will run a little, but not drip off, just the pigment pools at the bottom and you can't read the top of the letters. But I am mostly happy with the pens. They work well, just a little messy, so use paper towels to wipe the pens before writing and after. And store upright.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
Author: Amanda S Otten
Title: Does not erase!
Body: I completely ruined our first day of school chalk boards with these. I only used the white marker. It wrote great, but it didn‚Äôt come off at all. I tired first with a wet microfiber rag. Then tried rubbing alcohol. So upset that our boards are ruined, and of course they don‚Äôt make these anymore. The ink was on the boards for less than 24 hours before I tried to remove it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
Author: Matthew Schieve
Title: You will NOT be able to remove this from your board!
Body: Horrible little markers. Do not use them on a chalkboard unless you plan to repaint the board EVERY SINGLE TIME YOU USE THEM!! My photo shows how the board looks after SCRUBBING it!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
Author: ShopprX
Title: Ruined my Dry Erase Board
Body: Directions said to try in a corner of the writing surface so I did. A giant blob poured out of the marker soaking the wood of my brand new dry erase black board and running underneath the frame. Couldn't get the stain off the wood. I may be able to sand it off somewhat. What a ridiculous product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
Author: Kate T
Title: Edited
Body: Edit: After about 6 months of roughly monthly/weekly use, just to write up my work schedule and dinner menu, so not very much use at all, the orange marker is broken, and most of the other markers don't saturate properly. The liquid will well up around, but not actually ON the tip, so when you write it's all streaky. It takes several shakes & pressing, and I can't do it on a paper towel because that exacerbates the dryness. So I've had to press on my counter, and kind of dab the tip into the puddle it creates to be able to write. Despite wiping it up right away, the pink marker did stain a small spot of my counter. I was really excited to be able to write well on my calendar. Now it's a frustrating chore.Got these cause the markers that came with my black dry erase magnetic refrigerator calender were garbage. The picture makes them look better than they actually do. I can't see the purple at all, and can hardly see the other colors. This set is so incredibly different! True neon colors, way easier to write and see. It didn't take me long at all to shake/ press, shake/ press. Some of the ink did flow very fast, so be sure to have a paper towel or 2 folded up. I kind of rolled the side/ edge of the marker if I felt like there was way too much ink on there, so it wouldn't run. The closest that came to running was pink, but it didn't! 10000000 times better than the markers that came with my board! Also very helpful that ot came with labels, I did actually really need them. Easy to erase with damp paper towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
Author: renae abel
Title: They look great, if you can get them to work.
Body: They are bright and vibrant, but several don‚Äôt work- the ink comes out way too much and covers the tip, but won‚Äôt write still.

Title: Beautiful, but....
Body: These markers are bright and beautiful. They were easy to use and I was very happy with them. And then I tried to erase. The markers wouldn‚Äôt come off my chalkboard at all. I kept scrubbing, using the tips from the instructions, and eventually the marker came off... along with the chalkboard! I can now see the wood underneath and the chalkboard is gone where I wrote. I guess I gotta go buy another chalkboard for my daughter‚Äôs first day of school now.

The pens leaked a LOT while trying to use them, so that's why I'm not rating them 5 stars. Can't say I'd buy this exact product again, but it served it's purpose, so I'm satisfied with it.

Author: Elainie
Title: Vibrant Chalk Markers- Need Time to Dry, easy to clean up
Body: I LOVE how vibrant the colors are! I tested them out on the little chalkboard tags that came with the markers. Definitely beautiful and easy to use. Just follow the directions and the markers work. I had to hold the tip down for 10 seconds for some of the markers and others it took less time. Make sure the tip is filled with the color before writing/drawing for best results. I am pleased with the product.I am giving 4 stars because when I opened the Amazon package, the product‚Äôs box was open. You can see that it was ripped On top (probably didn‚Äôt see the clear tap on the package) and then opened on the bottom of the packaging. I have no idea if it‚Äôs because of the transport to get to me or if someone had opened it before shipping it to me. I do know with the COVID that they are taking special precautions with everything that is sent to the US. I just found it odd and uncomfortable. But the products work and they seem full so I have no other complaints! Can‚Äôt wait to use them in future projects üôÇI also want to mention that I have to wet a cloth and rub to get this to remove from the chalkboard. Once the marker marks are dry it stays put and isn‚Äôt streaky. 100% pleased with this product!

Body: These chalk markers are amazing, especially for the price! I have attached a picture of my new chalk board!! 10 out of 10 I would recommend.

Author: Blanco Family
Title: Pigmented AF!
Body: I love these bold chalk markers! Be sure to shake a little, push down on the tip until you start to see the ink roll down, cap it, shake some more and wah-lah these markers are ready to go!! As you can see from my picture they are pigmented AF and you can switch the tips. So you can either have a rounded tip or a chiseled tip like a dry erase marker. Love these markers ... 100% better than the ones I purchased before.

Body: Have not stopped decorating for holidays with these, since beginning at the start of October. The White JUST ran out today. Trial and error. Press down tip to re-ink. CLEANS OFF OF GLASS EASY WHEN DRY. WILL SMEAR SO BAD IF WET. Comes off skin with soap.

Author: lodolphin
Title: I even checked that my boards were non-pourous and followed their direction... BUT THEY LIE
Body: Update: I have tried multiple times to contact them. NO response!I followed the directions on the box. Test by allowing the marker to be on the board for 24 hours. I left the marker on for 48 hours and tired to erase and it came off. So I created three chalk boards (almost $300) using these markers. The boards were used for two weeks before I wanted to change them up, and now they DO NOT ERASE EASILY AND ARE PERMANENT. So now I have three boards that I can not change up as the seasons change. Author: rearea1222
Title: Doesn't come off
Body: markers look great on the board, bright and vibrant.  I didn't have to go over the letters multiple times like I've had to do with other chalk markers.  However they do NOT WIPE OFF.  I sprayed the board with acrylic spray, it is non-porous.  We left the writing on there for several days.  Tried to wipe it off with just water and then with a all purpose cleaner.  It doesn't come off.  Looks just as vibrant as the day I wrote with them.  So consider these permanent if you are not going to wipe immediately.  Now I have to buy a new board.

Author: Shelby
Title: Vibrant and easy to work with, removal could be better but it could be user error! ;)
Body: My husband and I teach a class of 5 and 6 year olds. There is a chalk board in the class and we wanted to use chalk markers instead of the awful outdated 1900's classroom chalk so we decided to buy these.They are very vibrant and can be runny when you are first using them but if you let them sit and give them a little shake before the next time you use them, they are good to go. They show up wonderfully on a black chalkboard.Now, they say they are wet AND dry erase but honestly, wet erasing them is MUCH faster and easier to do.We love using them and will continue to entertain our kiddos with the fun colors and drawings!

I use a paper towel so gravity actually works to pull the paint into the tip, lol. Can‚Äôt give 5 stars because as others have mentioned, the orange marker is useless. It barely shows up no matter how many times you shake it & press in the tip. Disappointing because I definitely wanted an orange marker, but oh well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer

Author: Small~Town~Girl
Title: ~ BEST Colored Chalk Markers I have Found. Bold, Bright, Fun, Easy. ~
Body: These Chalky Crown Bold Chalk Markers are absolutely the BEST colored chalk markers I have come across. Every other set of chalk markers I've tried has been difficult to get the colors flowing, not just at first, but each time. We use the weekly menu and the shopping list all the time. These chalk markers are also easy to remove with just a dry napkin. The grand kids love to fill in some of the menu items for me. These are non-toxic and I don't have to worry whether they are safe or not. Once in a while, they do leak, which I dab the marker on a napkin and that stops the problem. When mine have been used up, this is definitely what I will buy. So glad to have found some that work better. Also, these are bold and bright colors. Nice product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
Author: Mimi
Title: Great for car windows!
Body: Great chalk markers for car windows! The colors are vibrant and they stay on for several days without fading. Clean up is easy with a wet cloth and no residue is left behind. The only warning I‚Äôd give is when shaking the pens for the first time to make the ink come down the tip, SHAKE AWAY from you or onto a flat surface like a table or board. Reason is because the color might come splattering from around the top. Not too much, not gushing, but just little drops or splats. You don‚Äôt want to get stained if you‚Äôre wearing an nice outfit for your event. I‚Äôd definitely recommend these. Store markers upright in the box. I‚Äôve used mine 3 times already over a 2 month period and they haven‚Äôt dried up yet. Writing vertically is a breeze, color won‚Äôt fade out while writing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2020
Author: Elizabeth Alderman
Title: Highly recommend!!!!
Body: I recently got a chalkboard calendar as a gift and it came with one white marker. After looking at my hectic schedule and the chalkboard in all white, i decided i needed a little color pop! I ordered these markers and I am enjoying them so much! The width of the marker is perfect as well as the variety of colors! On the first time use, make sure you are patient (key to chalk markers!) and follow the directions regarding shaking and allowing the color to soak through the tip before first time use. The owner of the company was also very sweet and sent a few emails making sure i received the markers, making sure they were what i was looking for and offering any other assistance i needed!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
Author: Kelly R.
Title: Save your money and buy a brand that doesn‚Äôt dry up in a month!
Body: I bought these small tipped chalk markers on April 3, 2021. I used them to write in my calendar for April on the 5th. They worked great once I got the ink flowing. On May 4th I went to change my calendar and all of them were dried up but the green one which doesn‚Äôt work well at all. Unfortunately it was just past the return window. I went to push the tips in to get the ink flowing and nothing came out and on half of them the tips just stayed stuck in the marker. All the caps were on tightly I checked them back in April. At the same time I purchased these, I also bought the calendar that came with the bigger chalk markers which were the same brand and they still work fine. I‚Äôm very disappointed and hope the company can make this right. If you want the fine tipped ones I suggest looking at a different brand.

Title: Did not work for me  :(
Body: These did not work for me.I followed the instructions exactly.I shook them before each attempted use.I stored them tip down.I pressed the tip to allow ink to come down each time. Ink came down on my scratch piece of paper.I pressed til I got a big pool of ink sometimes.Would not write anything.Try to write on my dry erase calendar & regular paper and nothing. I tried all the colors and they're all the same.I wanted to try these because they were $5 cheaper than the Chalkola ones I've used in the past but since these will not work at all, I have just lost $15.I'm going back to Chalkola (Extra Fine Tip Liquid Chalk Markers for Chalkboard, Blackboards, Window, Bistro (10 Vintage Colors, 1mm) - Extra Fine Dry Erase Marker Pens)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
Author: Mom of 2yr old
Title: OK for the Money
Body: I was glad I read other reviews that mentioned getting these started is an adult only process.  It did take a bit of time and patience, and I could see how it would've been mess for my child to do.  I tested these on a window, let the colors sit for 2 days.  They wiped clean no problem.  Actually way easier to clean when fully dry then when wet.  My only issue with this is tip is pretty thin, so the colors get a bit washed out when trying to make larger objects.  And coloring in is tricky because the back-forth can pull away some of the color already on the window.  The lighter colors (yellow, white) don't show up at all on window on sunny day.  If the tips were fatter these would be prefect.  But overall my daughter had fun with them.  We got them for a car parade, so they served their purpose.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
Author: Heather
Title: Highly Recommend
Body: I would highly recommend Bold Chalk Markers to anyone in need of vibrant and versatile writing tools. This 20-pack of liquid chalk markers is perfect for a variety of surfaces, including chalkboards, signs, windows, and glass. The reversible tip allows for both fine and bold lines, giving you flexibility in your creations. Plus, the inclusion of 24 chalkboard labels is a nice bonus. Overall, these markers offer great value for the price and have become a staple in my crafting and organizing toolkit.

The purple and red are just okay for me. They show up but not quite as good as the other 4 colors. It's like they're really watery or something. This is my second box of these, the first box I had the purple, red and orange were also thin and watery. I ordered this 2nd box thinking maybe I just had a flopped batch or something. Body: I got these for my sons graduation, he wasn't able to have a traditional graduation ceremony so the school arranged a drive through graduation ceremony. These not only allowed me to write on my windows, but my trucks body as well, with zero damage. The colors are so vibrant and we got so many compliments. I love that It cleaned right off with water and soap. I ended up having a ton left over so decided to use them to color wooden bird houses with my daughter worked like a charm. They're overall a great product!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020
Author: TMD
Title: Bright and Cheerful
Body: These markers far out perform the window "crayons" I was using before.  These are easy to use, once you get the marker ink started to the tip.  They are bright and cheerful.  They wiped off easily when correcting small mistakes.  My hope is that they will wash off easily when it is time to remove them completely.  I used them on my vehicle windows during our "summer is here" farewell parade to wish the students in my class a great summer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
Author: Purpletutu
Title: Ruined my chalkboard! Do not buy!
Body: These markers do not erase clean. I followed the instructions and no matter what I did I could not get the markers completely off the chalkboard. You can clearly see what I wrote and even make out the colors of the words. These were brand new chalkboards for the first day of school and were the markers that were recommended by Amazon to buy together. Now both chalkboards are ruined, as I cannot get the markers to come clean or even faded to a point where It would not interfere with future writing. I did my research and I thought that these markers would be OK and easily removed. I was wrong. I can‚Äôt believe I wasted the money on the chalkboards and the markers both! Please save yourself the headache and do not buy these markers! There is no guarantee that they will wipe clean! So upset!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
Author: Laura
Title: Would be great if they all worked like they are supposed to...
Body: Of the 8 markers, I only have 3 that work properly. 4 of the others take coaxing to get to work at all and when they do I have to do multiple layers to get them to show up enough I can see them and the last one I just cannot use at all. I try coaxing it like I do all the others and I've even gone as far as taking the tip out and cleaning it. The cleaning works for the first time using it but then the next time I try it won't work and when I get the paint to come out it does so in a huge blob and that is it.

I just went to add something on today (the 20th) and one didn‚Äôt work, tried the next, same thing‚Ä¶I decided to take them all out of the bin‚Ä¶turns out 5 now aren‚Äôt working.I‚Äôve shook for probably about 5 minutes and blotted constantly‚Ä¶nothing.  Absolutely disappointed.  These were all stored felt tip down, covers as tight as possible.Definitely will not order again.

Now that I‚Äôve tried all the colors, I prefer the Cedar brand, except this brand‚Äôs white is better. Either way-  nothings perfect and I‚Äôm overall happy with how these work!!

Author: Greg
Title: Please consider buying a different product
Body: I tried 4 markers and 1/2 the markers don't work!I got this for a black glass board.The green and blue go on beautifully.The red and yellow are both broken and for whatever reason do not write on/stick to the glass nicely.It's streaky and you can see obvious areas where the liquid chalk didn't transfer.I thought maybe the glass was dirty so I cleaned everything off and tried again.Nope. Didn't fix anything.Again, the green and blue went on flawlessly while yellow and red struggled to stick to the glass properly.It's almost like the markers have different compounds in them.  I can't fathom why 2 write correctly and 2 don't, but this is not what I paid for.I paid for a pack of markers where ALL of them work.I've included a picture to demonstrate the inconsistencies between the markers I tested.The photo definitely enhanced the text image but you can *still* see where the yellow and red didn't transfer correctly.The 'e' especially shows this.I've also written many words on many different parts of the board and they all end up looking like crap when using the yellow or red markers.Yes, I've tried both sides of the tips and it doesn't affect anything.This is a very cheap product and you get EXACTLY what you pay for.Please, consider buying from a different seller. One who sells something of a higher quality.

Body: The colors are vibrant, but I will be re-surfacing my chalkboard as I cannot erase this stuff. It wouldn't dry erase. It doesn't come off with water or with a wet microfiber cloth. The picture I have added is after scrubbing with Dawn dish detergent and a microfiber. It is only slightly faded. If I wanted paint markers, I would have to order paint markers. ETA(Sept. 2023) I used these on a DIY chalkboard sign I had made, using the Rustoleum brand chalkboard paint. I wonder if that had something to do with why these markers stuck so much. Also, the seller saw my review and contacted me offering a full refund for the cost of the markers. Originally a one-star review, but they get a start back for the effort of the refund. Says something about service. Still, the product did not work on my DIY chalkboard, although I have used several brands of chalk and a few other brands of chalk markers without a problem, so that's why a low rating.

Where as the flowers and border were made using a different brand that had better flow control.**

The colors were bright & beautiful, I have to shake it as instructed too much chalk paint came out so got some drips so I tried to erase it to do it all over only to find out it can‚Äôt be erased so board is ruined and 1st day of school signage also ruined.

Title: At least one marker is defective
Body: I bought these chalk markers to use on my SUV windows; however, when I followed the instructions to get the markers to start working, the green marker broke. As you can see in the photo, the paint never started to come out and the tip got stuck up inside the marker. I tried to get it to come back out, but couldn't.  Unfortunately, I missed the return window by a couple days so I can't return it. I ended up using two other colors and those markers worked well, after a little trial and error to get the right amount of paint to come out. (At first, it was so much, it ran down my SUV windows.) That wasn't a big deal, though, because it was very easy to clean off and start over.

Body: I bought these pens to use on a shiny black notice board, they are super vibrant, work really well once they get going and the range of colours is lovely. The reason I've given 4 stars instead of 5 is the lid. It is really hard to click it down fully and harder still to open it again, I think kids would definitely struggle (maybe not a bad thing) I suppose this stops the pens drying out but then yesterday my partner pulled at the lid so hard the whole base came off, the pen snapped and the nib was exposed. It was a pink explosion in the kitchen! Hopefully this was a one off because the pens are very nice, and I can now confirm, the pink at least, easily washes out of clothes.

Body: I had high expectations for these markers, after reading other people's reviews.  But they really let me down.  I bought them to use on a dry erase white board that I have to write on at work. Yes, the colors look good, but it's not worth all the mess and trouble.  I will just order a new set of regular dry erase markers.  And these?  I'm debating whether or not to just throw them in the trash.  I'm very irritated that I wasted so much money on these.

Body: Amending my review.  When I posted my original review, I mentioned that the markers aren't washable and my granddaughter ruined her clothes. I also got a personal letter of apology from the company co-founder, providing a phone number if there was anything she could do. I repeat what I said in my original review: they are nice, bold markers and fun to work with. My mistake was putting them in the hands of a 2.5 year old without a smock. Her clothes were ruined. I mistakenly thought they were washable. I'll buy them again for her when she's a bit older. Thanks.

Be very mindful of the materials you use them on. Dry time is incredibly fast and it is WET erase so don‚Äôt be alarmed if they don‚Äôt come off easy with dry erase. Great quality and well worth the price. The marker tips are thick which allowed the kids to draw easier!

Body: these were great! I loved the bold colors. They stand out on the board for sure. And they stay really well. It takes a little elbow grease to get it off the board, but if you are wanting something to stay for a good while and not get messed up, these are fantastic!

Author: Amazon Customer

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024
Author: Suzanne
Title: Great chalk markers
Body: Love how bright these are when you write and it's easy to see once it's dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2024
Author: Bonstance
Title: Smooth writing, bold color markers
Body: Love these markers.  Once they are ready to use, they write smoothly without fading or skipping.  The colors are bold, and even with the fine (1mm) tips, the writing stands out nicely, except for the red - I think it's a little dull.  I used them on labels on some canisters, and had no problems removing the dried writing with a damp paper towel.I have a few other brands of chalk markers that fade/skip as you use them, and/or the colors aren't as nice.  My only issue with the pack I received is that the blue marker is not usable.  I don't know if it dried out or was just empty, but no fluid will come out of it at all.  I have reached out to the company, and will update when resolved.In photo, colors are as follows, from left to right: yellow, red, purple, white, green, orange and pink.  The colors are more vibrant in person, except the red is slightly less red looking.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021

Title: False advertising
Body: These are not the colors showed on the pictures.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2024
Author: ShopGirl67
Title: Great!
Body: Wrote on my car for the Eras Tour with these and they were great! Color were bright, they didn‚Äôt drip at all and completely came off in the car wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
Author: fran
Title: Waste of money
Body: Poor quality and they seemed dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024

So I‚Äôm not going to suggest these to anyone. Maybe I got a fluke case(?) But I‚Äôm definitely getting a different pack next time

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
Author: Lucia Pascual Inaraja
Title: I CAN'T remove the chalk markers.
Body: Color are beautiful but unfortunately I cannot remove it. üòï  I have try everything and I have to buy another board.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
Author: Ruby Rodriguez
Title: Markers run out of color very quickly
Body: Excited to use this chalk markers on my new Calendar. At first they worked excellent, not as bright as i thought they would be but still enjoyed them. However after testing them. I put them to side for about a week. When I came back to use them in setting up my Calendar for the upcoming month of April i realized that after a few writing a few letters the markers color seemed to have been running low. I checked to ensure that i did not leave them uncovered and possibly could have dried out, but know top was securely tighten on as i tried again the others I was having the same issues. Markers run out extremely fast. Seems as if I would have to purchase a pk for each calender month.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
Author: Rosie E.
Title: Thin and bright!
Body: These are exactly what I needed for my fridge calendar to fill in the dates in the small boxes and to write things on it. So far the markers are very bright and easy to use once you get the ink flowing. Some people mentioned the cap not going back on properly- I noticed some snap back on while others don't 'snap', so I just make sure to push those caps back on really hard. It came with some instructions and stated that these are not to be used on any porous chalkboard material otherwise it might not come off. The little sticker labels it came with are nice, although they are textured so as I wrote the ink kind of splattered a bit... but I don't mind too much. Quick drying. So far I really like these!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2020
Author: selene
Title: Very Solid!
Body: This stuff slapped on like a marker so much so that I thought I'd never get it off. Luckily, it dries in about 5 or 10 minutes and you can wipe it off with your hand. I have these spray-on chalk boards and I litter them around my room with words of encouragement, doodles of plants, or buff frogs for the giggles.We even tested it with my college-grade pastel chalks that I use for sidewalk art and drawings, and it's a lot more pigmented and bright than the pastels. (I wouldn't recommend these on ACTUAL sidewalks though, because the marker could get frayed. Although if they had replaceable nibs then MAYBE.)However we haven't tested it on glass/metal/ceramic... but it'd be nice to dress up my ceramic hedgehog in rainbow colors!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
Author: Stephanie
Title: Best chalk markers I've used!
Body: I have ordered many different chalk markers over the years and just was never really happy with any of them. The reason I chose to buy these is because they had a clear video of how to remove it which I thought was very nice and gave me some good pointers. And I have to say these are excellent chalk markers! They work really well, the ink flows very nicely, not too fast like other markers and the colors look amazing! And yes so far has been easy to remove and re wright! I'm going to recommend these to all my crafty mom friends!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
Author: Jennifer Jentzsch
Title: Best dry erase pens ever!
Body: I bought the 1mm liquid chalk dry erase markers to go with the magnetic menu/chore charts. They are perfect! The colors are fun and vibrant. They write very smoothly and dry very quickly. Comes off without smudges using a paper towel. If it gets on your fingers at all it easily washes off with water. Would highly recommend-great product!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
Author: L.H.
Title: Awesome!
Body: Not only was it made in my mother land of Puerto Rico!!! The product arrived in the perfect timing, great price and quality! It works great on car windows as you can see I used them for my 5th grader‚Äôs graduation parade and on his last day of school chalk board! Very easy to use and clean. My favorite part was how vivid the colors looked on the surfaces when completely dry!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
Author: Kelly C
Title: Vibrant Colors and Easy Removal
Body: Used it on a porous chalkboard. Was so happy with how vibrant the colors were and was really impressed with how bright they were. Was worried about the colors coming out because there was a warning about chalk markers on the board I was purchasing. Lucky enough, they had a card included in the box to scan for a video with instructions on removing the chalk marker from various surfaces.  It worked!! So happy with this product and will buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
Author: Alex S
Title: They work amazing!
Body: Perfect for what we needed! We bought this decorate a van for school promotion parade. The pens are easy to use, bright in color and super easy to clean off the windows afterwards. We even left some on for a few days and it was still very easy to clean off then. Would highly recommend these. Will be buying again when we need more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
Author: Stacey
Title: Worked great!!
Body: These markers were amazing! They were bright bold colors and did not run.  I even used them on my stainless steel refrigerator, and it came off with no problem. The only issue I had was on the toilet seat, it did not come off. LOL The mirror ended up getting a little wet throughout the day,  which caused the design to run. Not a big deal, I still loved the markers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
Author: Jennifer McClure
Title: Great quality and color!
Body: My daughter had drive-thru graduation this year so we got to decorate our vehicle. Once the pens were primed, they wrote great and the colors were solid and vibrant. My husband was worried they wouldn't wash off later, but the next evening they washed off fine. Very pleased and now want to use them on EVERYTHING! THINKING HOME WINDOWS FOR HOLIDAYS NEXT!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
Author: Amber
Title: At first was like yay‚Ä¶.then the next day it was oh nooo
Body: These chalk markers blew me away at first they wrote so nicely and I was able to wipe clean and start over after my kids changed their mind on their favorite movie 677 times.Then the next day for the 678th time they changed their mind on their favorite movie and when I went to wipe clean what we previously wrote it wouldn‚Äôt come off. It‚Äôs like permanent marker. I tried water nope won‚Äôt come off.Moral of the story don‚Äôt let it dry and you‚Äôll be fine. 10/10 don‚Äôt recommend for reuse purposes. My children will forever be stuck with their 678th choice for favorite movie. Ruined both my girls first day of school boards. Bummed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
Author: Jennifer B
Title: Dont waste your money!!!!
Body: I bought tjese markers to use on a chalk oard in my kitchen whede I wrote the weeks activities and dinner menu.  Inwas pretty happy with the markers the first tine I used them.  It took a while for the ink to  come out and fhe line is not consistent at all.  Sometimes its very, very thin, and other times you get a big thick blob.  Nbd, I figured that out and made it work.  The problem is that this stuff DOES NOT COME OFF!!  Apparently I am not the only one who has experienced this because they in lude insfructions to use windex and a "Magic Eraser" which didnt work, btw.  Even using their method, you can still see traces of previous writing.  Not happy with this product at all

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
Author: Silgi Varghese
Title: It did not erase my board.
Body: I have a first and last day of school board. It is meant to be written with chalk. However, this chalk marker left permanent markings. I realized it was tough to erase as it was drying up. I tried washing it and alcohol rub, which didn‚Äôt help. I winded up scrubbing for a long time with magic eraser to lighten it up the chalk as much as I can. I recommend you trying it on a small area before you write up your board.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
Author: Nuni Nunez
Title: I wanted to give 5 stars
Body: I can‚Äôt give all 5 because I can‚Äôt use 2 of the markers. The pink and orange are soo watery they‚Äôre practically translucent on the my chalk board calendar. I have another set that is not as fine and I have to go in with a bigger marker to make sure I fill in the color. It‚Äôs so annoying. Otherwise I love them. They write great. They‚Äôre pigmented and glide smoothly. All except for the pink and orange

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
Author: Todd
Title: Markers dry up quickly
Body: I ordered these in January because of the good reviews. I was looking for a fine tip marker. They worked great the first time. The colors were very bright and the fine tip was perfect. However, when I went to use them the second time, many of the markers were no longer working. One of the markers was leaking and I was unable to write neatly with it. I contacted Amazon and exchanged the markers. Again, the first time the markers worked great but the second time, many of the markers were not working again. Returned and back to the slightly more expensive ones from the store.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
Author: VanessaKelby
Title: Some Leak and Some dried
Body: So after a month or so these weren‚Äôt great ;( . Some leaked when I would press down trying to get the point to get the ink out most of them don‚Äôt work anymore the ink is inside but without leaking and making a mess we have no use for them. Very disappointed! We loved the vibrant colors of them though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
Author: Anne
Title: Disappointed
Body: I‚Äôm quite curious as to how these have such good reviews. Half of mine dried up within a month some of them halfway work others I  have to push so hard to produce any chalk but then a big splat comes out just not satisfied at all. Very disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
Author: A.Frazier
Title: Pick a different brand!
Body: These markers are terrible! I would not buy again and likely won‚Äôt even deal with trying to use them. They make a mess trying to get them primed to start writing and this needs done with every use on these ones. Once something does come out it‚Äôs very discolored, watery and drips all over.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
Author: lyrpabw
Title: Not a good product
Body: I was very sad to say that these were a total disappointment. These pens leaked all over my hand and the car I was decorating. And not just one pen. Every single one. When you would begin to use it, the ink would just begin to run down your arm, onto to the car, where you did not want it to be. I wish that I had returned them in time to get my money back. Oh well. Learned my lesson. Very disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
Author: karem castane
Title: horrible
Body: These chalk markers say they  are washable for non poreous surfaces. I used them on a flat baby milestone monthly chalkboard and then took baby pictures. One hour later I went to wipe of with damp cloth and nothing came off. I went on to try soapy water and all purpose cleaner. Nothing worked. The chalk board is permanently ruined as I cannot use going forward. This is the worst purchase I have made on Amazon as not only do I regret these markers but now also need to get a new chalkboard.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
Author: Stefanie Bensmiller
Title: These are Horrible
Body: I wanted some bold colors fine tip to use on my calendar and these suck. They don't work and I am so frustrated I don't know what to do at this point but throw them away. Some of the colors didn't ever work, most the tip stops working and so with much frustration you can finally get it to write but it is barely legible because the chalk isn't fluid so it looks awful on my chalk board. Very disapppointed as this brand was one of the only fine tip chalk markers in the market. Wish I wouldn't have wasted my money nor got my hopes up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
Author: Kenny and Julieta
Title: Most of the marker tips get stuck when you press down
Body: Most of the marker tips get stuck when you press to get the ink out. There's no easy way to turn the tip around without making a mess. The ink runs on se.of.the markers making lettering very hard, others are just fine. Drawing and letters thin out after drying. Cleaning is a pain as it takes several wipes to get it all off because it leaves residue.Great color selection. Very vibrant.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
Author: Haley R.
Title: Washes away quickly
Body: We used this product to write on the car windows. We did it at night and let it sit until morning. Not even literally 2 minutes in the rain driving down the road, it washed away completely. So if you want something extremely temporary that washes away super easy and doesn‚Äôt stay‚Ä¶ this is your product. We were very unhappy as we‚Äôve seen some window markers be able to stand blistering winds and weathers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
Author: Stephanie Griggs
Title: Confused and disappointed
Body: When I first opened and used the chalk markers I like the packaging and the markers were all accounted for. I wasn‚Äôt as happy with how the chalk came streaming out all over my chalk board paper, it made a mess. I then said to myself let me try another and after getting the chalk to come out of the other pens I realized that some were dried out, and some were runny as water. The light blue and the purple worked amazingly but the pink and the white and the yellow were runny, the orange and the red barely would write so I‚Äôm wondering if I got a bad box or did anyone else have this issue?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
Author: Skye
Title: Could be great if they were reliable
Body: These markers would be great if they all worked and always worked. Half of the colors can‚Äôt be seen when I write on our chalk board and the other half and up spluttering ink everywhere when you write. I followed the instructions on the box to set up the markers but they still mess up almost every time I use them. The colors are great when they work and for the first week all but two were great but it‚Äôs been 3 weeks now and almost all of them have faded or splutter ink when used. For the price I expected better quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Leaves a mark on the chalkboard
Body: The markers are very bright and beautiful, but they don't work like they should. I used a chalkboard spray to create a chalkboard, and then used these on it and they left a very noticeable mark. It ruined the chalkboard that I created and I will have to respray it to fix it. I thought that maybe it was the chalkboard spray that was the problem so I tested it on a normal chalkboard and it still left a mark. (The mark was smaller on the normal chalkboard, but it was still noticeable). This is extremely disappointing and I would not suggest buying from this brand.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
Author: robbin rinehimer
Title: doesn't work very well
Body: some write and some don't. they seem to leak from the tip so don't store them upside down. and some don't want to write after you break the white seal through for the color to show up. I bought these markers once before and never had a problem.  but I ran out of them so I had to order more, but this batch isn't very good so I'm giving them two stars.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
Author: Nikki Gilpatrick
Title: Very inconsistent
Body: I bought these chalk markers to create a board for my kitchen and they‚Äôre at best, okay. The green and white worked fine, but the thinness of the lines are inconsistent because the ink will bubble from time to time. I kept them horizontal and shook each before use and in between. The orange is the worst. The first time I used it, the color was bright even though the ink bubbled horribly. The second time I used it, the ink is less opaque and bubbled even worse, leaving the pen to go from unwritable and dry to big, caked lines.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2020
Author: stephanie valverde
Title: Disappointing
Body: I‚Äôve bought chalk markers in the past and decided to try these because of the colors included and the fine point. These are not at the top of my list of favorites. The tips are very stiff, even after pressing down to get the liquid flowing. The white chalk marker was the most difficult to use of the bunch. It‚Äôs almost as if they caps were left often and they dried out or maybe they were just old. I eventually used the old set I had. Needless to say, I won‚Äôt be buying another set of these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
Author: The Grove
Title: Unable to erase
Body: Although the colors were bright, and the markers wrote well, it WON'T come off.  The chalk board we used was non-porous, which is why I cannot understand what the issue is.  We have tried an eraser, water, alcohol wipes, and it will not budge.  I do not recommend.  I am now in the market for looking for a new chalk board because this one is ruined thanks to this product.  Do NOT recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
Author: Kimberley Hendrickson
Title: Nice colors but the tips are problematic.
Body: The tips are problematic.  One marker tip would get stuck on the first use. Since the rest were fine, I didn‚Äôt try to return them. Now I‚Äôm using them a second time.  I‚Äôve shaken the marker as instructed and depressed the tips till liquid chalk is flowing but the tips get stuck and they means the liquid chalk just runs out and puddles on your board.  Basically means you can‚Äôt use them.  So consider them single use which makes them quite expensive.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
Author: Lisa Caruolo
Title: Short lived & Leaky - DISAPPOINTED
Body: I AM A REVIEW SEEKER. I rely on reviews and others experiences to determine if I buy a product. Not going to blindly trusting so easily anymore. I was looking forward to having a variety of colors but I was very disappointed. Shaking these markers left splatters everywhere and so far 3 of the colors are out already. I have used them ONE TIME!!! VERY LOW QUALITY.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: only work once
Body: These are vivid colors. Loved them the first time I used them. But only the first time. Getting them to work at all again was very hit and miss, clogged up, couldn't get ink to flow evenly, blobs and messes. I bought these because the brand I was using doesn't have fine tip but I'll deal with the bigger tips because they actually worked.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
Author: Samuel
Title: Some are watery
Body: I love the boldness of the markers and love you can flip the tips. But no matter how much I shake it before use, half the markers coming out really watery looking. I've even tried removing the tips to clean them, dry it out then put it back in and it's still watery. Really disappointed with these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2022
Author: Mom of 2 boys
Title: One time use
Body: Used these for first day of school board.  After a little trial they started working, completed the board, went back a couple days later to change one of my child‚Äôs responses and the marker had completely dried up. This happened with several of the colors needless to say I could not use for my second child forward two weeks later and I will not be able to use them another year.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
Author: Adriana Elson
Title: Waste of money
Body: Does not write well on my car windows which was the whole purpose of buying them. I intended on writing special graduation messages on my car wi Dow for my sons high school graduation car parade ceremony. The paint comes out easy enough but as it dries it get shriveled up and dotted making the paint look like it had gotten wet. Tried using on both my car and my friends car and it did this to both types of windows.  Was very disappointed. Tossed the markers. What a waste of money!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
Author: CDEggleston
Title: Very disappointed in these markers but the company messaged me to make it right.
Body: I bought these markers for my kids first day of school. I left them on for about 6 hours and tried to wipe them clean with hot water. They stained my white boards! I‚Äôm gonna hope I can find something to clear it up but as of right now my boards are ruined. I bought these because they specifically said they wipe clean. This is so frustratingUpdate: I didn‚Äôt think any companies looked at Amazon reviews. The company contacted me and gave me a gift card for the balance. The customer service was so good that I updated my review. They did say that they plan to update their product. I did also find, after several YouTube videos,  that the markers did rub off my board with magic eraser and lots of scrubbing. So if you buy these markers have magic eraser available because water/windex is not enough.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Author: MCG
Title: Some work, some don‚Äôt.
Body: Middle of the road, unfortunately. About half of them work beautifully. Bright, opaque, consistent flow, nice tips for writing. The rest of them - one worked well on day 1 and stopped working on day 2, and the others are just milky transparent color no matter how much you shake them or prime the tip.As far as cleaning off the chalkboard, I don‚Äôt seem to have the same issues as others have had. I used chalkboard paint to make a space about 15 years ago so it‚Äôs had plenty of time to be primed as the manufacturer suggests. So no problems there.Too bad the quality is inconsistent. I would have been a repeat customer but will look for something else to try.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Author: Matt Pline
Title: Great but not great
Body: These chalk markers worked great to write on my daughters first day of school sign. The changeable tips were helpful, colors were vibrant, and I had no problems getting the ink to come out. However, I made up the sign Monday night to take pictures with Tuesday morning and I tried to wipe the sign clean Tuesday afternoon. Some came off but some not so much. I can still see most of the writing very finely on the sign and the blue is still very noticeable. I tried washing it twice and still no better. I think it will be fine to write over the top of the residue for next year but I will be using different chalk markers next time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
Author: Toni Lynn Davis
Title: Doesn‚Äôt wipe away that well off ‚Äúbalk to school‚Äù board
Body: The colors were thick consistency and pretty. Problems: it took a while initially for the ink to come out. You have to press down on the tip of the marker for a while for it to come out, which isn‚Äôt that big of a deal. It says that it wipes up easily, but it did not wipe all the way off of a back to school chalkboard I had. I‚Äôm not sure if this was due to the chalkboard quality or the chalk, but it permanently left behind residue and now I have to buy a new chalk board. I would recommend them for products you don‚Äôt plan to wipe away.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
Author: Love to Read
Title: Seriously???
Body: I don't understand how these got such a high rating! I bought them for my granddaughter's chalkboard. THEY DON'T ERASE!!!  I "seasoned" them as directed but I still can't erase them. I have to use a damp cloth to remove them from the chalkboard. Then have to wait until board dries to use them again. They do, however, seem to work well on glass, but that's not why I purchased them. Seriously, it's supposed to work like chalk, easy to erase with a rag!!!  Very disappointed!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
Author: Marie
Title: Honest review.
Body: I read reviews and thought they'd be great. At first I was happy, it looked great and worked well. It took a lot of effort to get them going but I figured as much. Over time (a few weeks) some stopped working and some exploded (left a lot of ink, big blotches, when it shouldn't). Not particularly happy with them now. I'm sad because this was to help color coordinate my classes and schedule on a chalkboard calander, and it's already going downhill. But hey, the blue one still works decent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
Author: Tabitha
Title: Love the colors not loving the way they dry and skip
Body: So I really wanted to love these markers but I don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôm using them incorrectly after I write with them the letters kind of dry up and bubble to erase I can‚Äôt explain it but I‚Äôm not happy with these because it looks messy and I needed it to be as clear as possible I think the white marker worked the best but I‚Äôm not loving it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
Author: K. Bot
Title: Pink stained my chalkboard
Body: The lighter colors are easier to scrub off but the more pigmented ones like pink are pretty difficult. My chalk board is stained, and that‚Äôs after a solid few minutes of scrubbing at it with a wet cloth. I tried using a universal cleanser on it but it didn‚Äôt work that well. The colors are bright and beautiful though. If you don‚Äôt mind staining this is a good product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
Author: Lasondra Land
Title: Expensive and don't last long
Body: I used these to decorate my car for a parade. Most of the colors worked well, pretty bold, except the yellow was mostly empty/dried out so I couldn't use it. I only decorated my car once and the markers are mostly used up. Super expensive for a one time use type deal. I'm disappointed, to say the least. The colors washed off super easily and didn't leave residue behind on the glass. I just wish they would have lasted longer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2020
Author: Le
Title: Messy but bright
Body: They come in a good size but when it tells you to press until the ink bleeds into the tip it came out in a gush with each and every one of them it was a mess everywhere. Thankfully it cleans up easy but I won't be letting my kids use these. I pressed them onto a plastic lid I had and since it was a puddle of each I dipped a paint brush in them and started painting letters for my toddlers

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2021
Author: Bethany_lse
Title: Difficult to remove
Body: We used this on a first day of school sign for our daughter.  It's not traditional chalkboard, it's the paint on kind.  I spent $30 on the sign to be able to use it year after year (my daughter is in kindergarten) and we can't get this off.  Beautiful colors,  I just wish there had been some warning

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
Author: Ashley Boens
Title: Short life span
Body: When these markers work they are great! Vibrant colors and easy to remove. The only problem is some of them are already fading. Two of the colors struggle work now no matter how much I shake and prime them and I‚Äôve only had them for a couple months. They only get used once a week for a weekly meal plan calendar.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
Author: Anthony C.
Title: Pretty colors
Body: I love the bold colors. It can be a bit of a pain to wash it off but does come off easy, just takes a bit of time to make the windows fully clean again and not have chalk residue. I also had an issue with the markers leaking but I would buy again! They are fun to use and keep the kiddos entertained on rainy days.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not the best but not the worst
Body: Not sure if it's the chalk board I have but some of these markers didn't work for me. I have one of those peel and stick chalkboard calendars and the only marker that never failed was the white one. The colored markers were hit and miss. Some showed up fine but not very vibrant and others just never showed up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
Author: Diana Pedroza
Title: Bright vivid colors but hard to remove on chalkboards
Body: Got the markers and was really impressed on how bright they are. They also start working very easily once you press down and let the ink sink to the tip.Although they are chalkboard markers I feel like these are better for glass boards/ windows / white boards.I had to use cleaner and a magic eraser marker to remove off my chalkboard (which is what the company suggests)but it was a big hassle removing just a small amount of writing I did on my blackboard. I absolutely hate the squeaking sound of chalkboards so it was literally hard for me to clean it because I was cringing the entire time.(But if chalkboards don‚Äôt make you cringe maybe it won‚Äôt bug you)All in all a good product but not great for chalkboards unless you don‚Äôt plan on erasing it much. Maybe you want to use them on a sign that you don‚Äôt plan on changing very often, then this might be good for you.I was planning on using them on a blackboard my kids use so definitely not good for what I wanted it for. I‚Äôm hoping to get a Glassboard to use this product on instead.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
Author: Celina
Title: Bright and colorful
Body: Loved the bright colors, they are so fun. These markers were exactly what we were looking for. Only reason I gave them a 4 overall (would like 4.5 instead) is because when we were shaking the markers to get more ink to come out, a couple of times the tips flew out (lol)...we were easily able to put them back in and continue using the markers but we weren't expecting them to fly out so easily. We learned to keep the caps when shaking them from there on out. Great markers for sure! would buy again and would recommend them to family and friends. Great to have for today's environment and for letting our essential workers know we are thankful, for writing messages to our graduates or for birthdays, holidays...anytime you want to display a message that will not be missed. Get these markers!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2020
Author: Mallorie
Title: Got the job done
Body: We used these for several chalk boards at my sister's wedding. They looked great once we had them all on and finished, but they can be a bit finicky to use. The color doesn't  always come out with full opacity, particularly on the colors. White was the best of the bunch, but we used some of the colored pens for a floral design and you could still see the black chalkboard beneath the drawing. We tried to put a second layer over top once it had dried and it just removed what had already been there rather than allowing us to add a second coat so be aware of that. Otherwise they worked great, glad we had them as we used some regular chalk for outlining and it was no where near as defined or vibrant as these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
Author: Susan N.
Title: Great colors and easy clean up.
Body: Great on windows! I bought this for use on my car and home windows and it wiped off perfectly. The only problem I had was using the red marker on the white body of a car. The car was driven around and sat in the sun for a few hours before I attempted to clean it off. It took a very long time to get all of the marker off of the car but if you stick to windows and only use lighter colors, such as yellow or orange, on the body of the car it should come off easily!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
Author: Matilda C.
Title: Have to shake a LOT before first use
Body: I used these markers to "prom-pose" to my boyfriend. I wrote on his car when he was unsuspecting. I did get some weird looks from the neighbors as I stood in the street shaking the markers to make them work for the first time. Once they were ready to go, I had no issues with them. They weren't streaky or runny. My boyfriend hasn't actively tried to remove the messages from his car and despite rain - they stuck around for over a month. So, you might have to put effort (soap and water) into changing or removing what you write with the markers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
Author: jamie
Title: Breeze to use
Body: WE have reuseable boxes for our delivery of food.  We are able to use these to write messages and contents for our residents in a retirement community ....they love the colors.  They are easy to use.  The only reason I gave a 4 instead of a five...is that you have to be careful to let people know not to press too hard on the tip....as more liquid can come out !!!  otherwise...great colors, fun , easy and helps on hard plastic to be washable after.  !!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
Author: LJ247
Title: love this product!
Body: I purchased these chalk markers to write on the windows of my vehicle. At first, I was a little concerned that they would not be bright enough and the lines would not be thick enough. Not an issue once I began to use them. The colors are bright and the thickness of the lines is just right. If you want thicker lines, you just need to double up. I only wish that there was more of a variety of colors and line thickness options.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
Author: Elizabeth J. Bennett
Title: Did The Trick
Body: My kids and I had fun decorating my car windows for a recent graduate who got jipped out of a grad ceremony & party d/t COVID-19 so we had a car-parade to celebrate. Easy to use. Stayed on through light drizzle but was still easy to clean off with Windex afterwards. Can be drippy if you hold tip down too long or shake too hard (stained clothes so be careful).  The red was not really red & was dull compared to the other brighter colors.. Not a deal-breaker for me so I would still recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Author: TLDuval
Title: These are THE BOMB!
Body: I am more than happy with this set of chalk markers. They are super bright, cheery colors that jump out at you from a blackboard, exactly what I wanted for a board at work. The last set I had by a different company was awful. So, as I looked at reviews and tried to choose a new set, I didn't have high expectations. I wondered if that was just how chalk markers were. These far exceeded my expectations and I'll buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2021
Author: The Heise Fam
Title: Great for chalk boards, windows, arts and crafts
Body: We used this product to do our daughters back to school chalk board and a few other activities. The colors are very pigmented and bright. Easy to remove from intended surfaces, however harder to remove from clothing if you spill. The markers drip if you press down on them too many times as well, so just be careful and once they are started you really shouldn‚Äôt have to press on them hard at all. I also used these to draw on windows at my job and they worked so well. Just as bright as when on chalk board and easy to remove with soaps and water or a baby wipe (this is the same way to remove from chalk board as well)! I let my four year old daughter use these to color on paper and our windows at home, she had such a blast and it was a super quick and easy clean up!Last thing, if you haven‚Äôt used these before, the way to get them started is to gently press the tip down and release until you start seeing the tip go from white to the intended color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2024
Author: Sarah Jenkins
Title: Nice colorful markers
Body: These are very nice markers. I have just started using them but so far I really like them. I have not had any problems with smearing or wearing off. They are very bright and colorful and look amazing. Plus the price is right.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2024
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Easy to erase
Body: Saw reviews saying it wouldn‚Äôt erase but I did not have that problem. Just a little water and it erases easily! Maybe it was the board they were writing on?!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024
Author: Harleygirl79
Title: vivid markers!
Body: i have a black board and these colors look so amazing!  so easy to see everything!  i love the way they write also!  will def purchase again when they run out!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2024
Author: AeF
Title: Long lasting markers
Body: I bought these markers four years ago, and despite only using them twice a year, they‚Äôve not dried out and the colors have lasted well. Good quality markers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2024
Author: Taisha
Title: Very bright
Body: These chalk markers are so bright! I love the vibrancy of the colors. They‚Äôre also a good size for writing. I got the 1mm so they‚Äôre very fine but works for its intended purpose. Would buy again!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Author: Tonya Blanchard
Title: Great Quality
Body: Bought these for the ladies in the cafeteria to write on the glass on what we were serving for lunch. The kids loved it and comes off easily.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
Author: Dmn
Title: WONDERFUL chalk markers!
Body: These chalk markers are fantastic! The colors are bold and vivid, and there are certainly many to choose from in this box of 40 - perfect for designs for all seasons.A couple of reviewers mentioned that the marker tips frayed upon priming.  I did NOT have this issue with any of them.  Perhaps they had a few faulty markers in the box or they pressed too hard...a few pumps with gentle pressure on a folded napkin is all it takes to get the chalk paint flowing to the tip. It‚Äôs very simple to switch between the regular and chisel tips - you simply pull gently on the plastic just above the tip, flip it around, and reinsert it.The markers easily wash off appropriate chalkboard surfaces with warm water.  I didn‚Äôt even have to scrub.  I wiped one design off after an hour without a problem and another design after 10 days without a problem.  There was some ‚Äúghosting‚Äù of the word and design outlines when I first washed the board off, but it disappeared completely after it dried (about one minute dry-time).See photos for examples of color brightness, wipeability, and how well the clean, dry board looks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
Author: SRB
Title: Vivid Colors, Easy Cleanup
Body: Prior to schools closing, I purchased those for use in my 3rd grade classroom. My students loved using these markers to write in their desks both to solve math problems and during indoor recess days to draw pictures! We have dark brown desks and the colors came out very vivid, ink flowed easily, and clean up was easy. Overall I highly recommend these markers, they worked great on desks and my whiteboard! Both teacher and students were very pleased :-)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020
Author: Kami Christian
Title: I wouldn't recommend these markers.
Body: There were several things I disliked about these chalkola markers. 1 the beveled tip was not precise and it left scratch marks on everything I used them on. 2 the tip seemed to fray the more I used them. It would leave traces of the the fibers along side of the actual line I just made. 3 some of them ran out very quickly. For instance I used the black to make 6 50 cent piece size circles and I struggled to get them completely colored in.What I liked about them was they included metallic colors. Of all the chalk markers I own these are at the bottom of my list. Maybe I got a bad box or something but I know I won't reorder these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2020
Author: Liza
Title: So much fun, wish they were refillable!
Body: Last semester I took a children's art/creativity class (I work with young children) and we were encouraged to design art experiences for young children that allow them to explore as many different materials as possible, rather than focusing on the work they create.  "Process not product."I'd never tried chalk markers before and I thought they would be fun (even for me) as I like the looks of them when I see the results on "chalkboards" outside of restaurants.These are great.  I tried them on a plastic surface (a binder with the clear plastic on top) and was able to erase my work afterwards.  And they inspired me to "draw" (it's more like paint) on my front window.To whomever said that they take a long time to become usable, mine were fine but I read the directions!  You have to push the tip down a few times in order to get the ink flowing.  Also, shake before use.  I had no problems.I docked one star because I feel kind of guilty using them.  Yes, they are non-toxic with environmentally friendly ink, but I would LOVE if you could refill the ink via the top because it's kind of a big pen to just dump in the landfill when the ink runs out.  Also, I'd love if there was some kind of assurance that the laborers who made these were treated fairly since these were made in China, fair trade certification or something.But as far as do I enjoy owning a set of chalk markers and do these work?  Yes.P.S.  I feel these are a little heavy for preschool children but would be great for older children (1'st grade and above) and I would have loved to see what my high school students would have done with them <3

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2021
Author: Carole J.
Title: Vibrant & easy to clean!
Body: I really love these markers!!! I used 14 of them on this milestone board. They are so vibrant, with so many different colors, and very easy to erase using a wet cloth. I‚Äôve only used them on a blackboard, but they color it well and come off completely from my board. It takes minor effort to get the liquid flowing through the markers‚Äîjust a few shakes and pushing the tip repeatedly until the liquid makes it to the tip. This was the first time I used metallic colors, and they are beautiful. They seem to have a bit of a glittery look. Love these colors; there are so many, and they are pretty affordable. Great quality and quantity‚Ä¶I definitely recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2019
Author: C.M. & T.M.
Title: good markers, but tips are not durable for heavy use/use on textured surfaces
Body: The colors seem vibrant and are opaque and not streaky, but one thing I am a little concerned about with these markers is the tips- I flipped the tip on one of the markers to the chisel end and primed the marker and by the time the marker had primed, the tip was completely flattened and frayed. The tips are definitely "mushy" to begin with and priming markers is sort of brutal on the tips anyway, so this one broke down very quickly.I'm planning to use the markers on the bullet side, so the loss of the chisel side of the tip wasn't a deal-breaker, but I would recommend priming the marker on the opposite end of the tip you plan on using, just to save the tips you WILL be using.I'm going to update my review if the tips don't hold up to regular use. For now they are working okay- I just wish the tips of the markers were a higher quality, but aat the price I paid for this collection of markers, I can't expect the most durable nibs in the world.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2020
Author: Brittany
Title: Forget the iPad!
Body: Love these!! They've kept my kids off the iPad for hours! All my windows and glass doors are covered in Easter egg, Easter Bunny and hearts, but they're so easy to clean off!! I give the kids the markers and my Norwex cloths, and they get creative!  They even drew Mo Willems pigeon and piggie!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
Author: vyioprah
Title: Love the color bright enough for my drawing
Body: I use them to draw ,they hold up well when I spray them sealant,

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
Author: Cheryl P
Title: Amazing!! Test a small section of your boards first!!!
Body: These Chalkola Markers are great!! Easy to prime, write, and erase. Nice bright colors. Love the reversible tips.They write and erase nicely on my grandson's Cra-Z-Art 3in1 Whiteboard and Chalkboard Art Easel. It's takes a little scrubbing on the chalkboard with a wet cloth to erase, if the chalk sat for awhile. You can erase with a dry cloth a few minutes after writing. I let the chalk sit overnight night on both boards, and there was no staining or shadowing.I included pictures of the alphabet freshly written and then erased on both boards. First a dry cloth, there's some chalk residue, but a wet cloth works best for both boards.Another picture in comparison when sprayed with eyeglasses spray (a wet paper towel works too) and a section of the alphabet erased with a wet cloth.

Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 8, 2021
Author: Ceri-Dee Jones
Title: Brilliant chalk pens
Body: Used to do a "birthday board" for my niece.Have done many of these over the years for my children and nibblings.These pens are great and definitely better than other brands I've used before.Five stars üåü from me.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2019
Author: Philip
Title: works as they should. I only have one issue with these
Body: they work as they should and look great. but i have 1 issue with these. I have the chalkboard sticky paper stuff on my cabinets that I use. these markers scratch the holy h*** out of the chalkboard material. once I clean them off i can see exactly what was wrote on them and it looks like someone wrote on them with a screwdriver or something like that. they have very hard tips on them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
Author: FaerieFire99
Title: Good product, fantastic company
Body: I had ordered a smaller set if the Neon and LOVED them. Unfortunately, I didn't read the instructions storage and messed them up. I need to stress here, I messed up. It wasn't hidden, or in another language, 100% me. So instead of getting the neon pack again,  I ordered this 40 set. Investing $40 in markers isn't something I normally do,  but I felt like it was a solid investment.  We're going to get a lot out of them. We had some issues and I reached out to the company first.  They understand customer service! They heard my problems then offered fair and reasonable solutions, including replacements. I normally would dock a point if any problem occurred, but their stellar response time and willingness to stand behind their products made up for it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: V. Nishida
Title: Excellent set!
Body: Used it on car windows to decorate for a drive-by birthday and it was awesome! Easy to use and easy to clean off. Stayed on great for days! Word of caution: Don‚Äôt use it on your painted car body though - I tested this on a small painted body of my car and while it wiped off just fine and easily, there was a very slight shadow left on the paint. I‚Äôm pretty sure it will come out after a good wash and polish but I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a good idea to do this and take a chance with ruining your car (my car is painted black, in case this matters). Great colors and value!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2019
Author: Barbara J Kelly
Title: Beautiful colors and easy to clean
Body: I bought these for my daughter as a Christmas present.  Since I got them early I had to try them out and they work perfectly. I enjoyed using them on her easel that has a white board and a chalk board. I know she will love them!! It will also be nice to have one set of chalk markers and not have to have chalk and dry erase markers. They are very easy to use and the colors look great on both the white board and chalk board. Cleanup was also a breeze...I couldn't leave any evidence! I can't wait for her to open these on Christmas morning!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2019

Title: Sadly a NO
Body: I really wanted to like these because there was soo many colors but they stained and ruined a brand new black board calendar. The picture taken was after using hot water, a new rag with hot water and soap, and another new rad with 90% rubbing alcohold and you can see it still didn't come off.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: DOES NOT ERASE!!!
Body: BEWARE - this was not erasable!! I have a double sided folding chalk board and had the writing on it for a max of two weeks and cannot get this "erasable" chalk off. I tried water first and then windex per the instructions. It has not even made a dent in getting removed. Only option now is to trash my chalk board or paint over it. Very disappointed in this product.

Title: Ehh

Body: Nice vibrant colors, easy to apply even coat

I saw the box of this Chalkola markers and took a chance.  The white was absolutely bright against the black background.  I love the variety of colors that they had.  This worked wonderfully on the calendar.  I would recommend this.

Title: Interchangeable tips
Body: This set of markers allows you to use a bold tip or chisel tip depending on the look you‚Äôre going for. Wide variety of colors to choose from and they look great on the chalkboard calendar I purchased.
