Body: I've tried several brands of chalk markers and these ones seem to have richer, more consistent color to their ink.

Author: Katie
Title: Pretty colors
Body: Very easy to clean off of a chalk board. Every  color you will ever need.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on January 2, 2024
Author: hope
Title: My favourite thick chalk markers
Body: I use these chalk markers almost every day. I even bought a second set for my work, which has been replaced once, because we used them all up.I‚Äôm a big fan of the flat tip so I immediately flip every single tip over to the broadside as soon as I get them. This is largely the only tip I use for these markers. They give the cleanest lines for writing. I use them every day to do the daily specials board in the store I work at. Fantastic. They are my favourite for writing I use thin tipped markers for drawing and doodling but ideally, if I‚Äôm going to write on anything as long as the space is big enough, I use this set on the broad tip and they are my favorite. In the picture above it is what was used for January .Small disclaimer- I have found that chalk markers do not like to be used on absorbent surfaces. Do not use them on paper or cardboard as it will decrease the longevity of the markers. When you‚Äôre going to do a test mark to see if it‚Äôs the colour you like, do it on the floor or a hard surface that you can wipe off of. I use these markers on windows, glass countertops, chalkboards, black and white dry erase boards.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on November 13, 2023
Author: blueskies29
Title: Worked great!
Body: My skills as an artist are not great but these markers are! They were easy to get started, flowed well and stayed put nicely once dry.I will be using them next to decorate windows for the holidays.

Author: Barb S
Title: Not worth the $30, unfortunately.

Author: Mason
Title: Easy to clean off true chalkboard material
Body: I liked the variety of colors for the price. I liked that there were two tips to the markers as well. They took a little bit to shake and get going but that‚Äôs to be expected. I was the most worried about how easy they were going to be to clean off since I did not want to lose use of my chalkboard. I cleaned it off with an envirocloth from Norwex and it came off easily and quickly and it had been on the chalkboard for about 24 hours. I also used them on a cheap mini ‚Äúchalkboard‚Äù sign that was essentially paper stuck to some plastic and it did not come off it easily. They were from the dollar store so I threw it away and it wasn‚Äôt a big deal. Moral of the story, the markers worked well and wiped off easily for me from a true chalkboard but not from a cheap wannabe chalkboard.

Author: Legal Beagle
Title: These are fabulous for a party
Body: My husband and I hosted a large Christmas party in which wine was served.  I used glass wine glasses.  As with any party, people put their glass down and then forget where they put it - especially after a couple of glasses of wine.  I had everyone write their names on their glasses when they arrived using these chalk pens.  I primed them in advance so that they were ready to use.  At the end of the evening, I ran water over the wine glasses and the chalk came right off.  I'm sure the dishwasher would have taken it off but since this was my first experiment with these, I wanted to make sure it was off before it got baked in by the dishwasher.  Now that I see how easily it came off, I would not hesitate to throw the glasses in the dishwasher without getting the chalk off first.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2021
Author: TwilightJunkie
Title: disappointed
Body: this is the 2nd pack of this brand /size, but this pack includes the 2 metallic colors which are new to us & the reason I got these. the last pack (which wasn't ordered through Amazon) the tips are EXCELLENT but several markers were very leaky, so bad some of them are unusable because they leak so much. this pack I'd hoped would be better but so far most of the tips are very disappointing. they're sort of frayed, so many of the brush strokes look feathered or jagged, not clean and smooth. I even reversed them but didn't help. I haven't used them enough yet to see how they hold up over time, or if they improve with use. I also don't yet know if they're going to leak - although the very neon ones - pink green & yellow - are much runnier/juicy on the tips, and not as opaque as expected. i have no complaints about performance about the 2 metallic pens, so far they're working the best. the only negative about the gold in particular is its very hard to clean off the board. we have a glass LED lighted sign. most of the markers dry erase pretty easily, except the bright neons smear when dry erased & need wet washed sometimes several times. the metallic gold needs ALOT of elbow grease to dry erase & SEVERAL wet WIPES to completely clean the glass. I expected better overall satisfaction from this brand, idk if I just got a dud pack? but for the expense & reputation of the brand I expected better.

Author: ESH
Title: Love the vibrant colors but had to search for eraser techniques.
Body: I used these markers on my chocolate in my kitchen for Christmas. These works so much better than regular chalk. The colors are bright and smoothly paint any design. However when I went to wipe them off with water it wasn't budging! I envisioned throwing away my Mom's Kitchen chalkboard but then searched for a solution. There are no solutions to this problem on the product information or reviews here. I had to go to the internet and found that using Mr. Clean's Magic Eraser works. It actually does! Cut off a piece of the magic eraser, wet the eraser and wring it out  and erase your chalk design to make a new one.

Title: Thin ink, doesn't show up well
Body: I wanted something thinner for our calendar and thought these would be just right. Nope. The color is very thin so it's kind of easy to see through which defeats the purpose. Definitely wouldn't recommend unless you don't mind them being slightly see through.I have markers from two other brands and both of them are good. Just wanted something that was a thinner line and neither of them had any available.

Title: Disappointed

Sort of like wash out. If you pull the tip and turn it , the other end will have fresh color on it, but hardly enough to write a word. I need a reliable pen, that can write on my dry erase organizer, without drying out after the first use. If possible different colors. Something I can change once a month or add during the month for a calendar. So disappointed.

Body: The main thing I like about these chalk markers is that the chalk lines come out very bright and substantive. You get a bold/colorful line on the first try. You do NOT get a faint line that you have to keep writing over and over . This is why I gave these markers a sheerness rating of 1.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
Author: asterisk
Title: Wrong item sent, but I actually like it better!
Body: These were advertised as being 10 markers in bright/primary colors with silver and gold markers, and 50 chalkboard labels. I received 8 "earthy color" markers with 8 chalkboard labels.I actually like these earthy colors better, but I have to take off 1 star, because what was ordered is what should have been sent. Having said that, if these earthy markers had been an option when I ordered, I would definitely have chosen them.The colors I received are: light blue, teal green, purple, sage green, rust red, white, peach, pale yellow.They go on vividly and precisely. You have to shake the marker vigorously, then push up & down on the tip to get the ink flowing. They wipe off easily with a damp cloth. The first few swipes do smear a bit, but then it does all come off.The tips are reversible, from a blunt to chisel tip. Just pull it straight out and flip it around. If you've already primed the marker, you'll get chalk on your fingers, so be prepared to wipe your fingers off.The paper that the stickers are stuck on measures 3.6x2.2". The stickers are all different shapes and a bit smaller than that size.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on September 17, 2022
Author: MooreaPQ
Title: Great markers, great colours, a bit expensive
Body: I wanted markers for the little blackboard in my van and I got these.They are very easy to use, the colours are great and they are less messy than regular chalks.The price is a little bit high for 10 markers and I wonder if they‚Äôll still work properly after weeks not using them, we‚Äôll see.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2020
Author: Texas Mama
Title: Very good chalk pens.
Body: These are handle chalk markers. Chunky with a fat tip, so any small detail might need a smaller tip pen. The box says the tip isreversible, so after you thrash the 1st one, flip it over I guess. Works on blackboards, ceramic, glass, windows and whiteboards. And since it's water-based, it washes out of clothes. When you want to wipe off surfaces, you'll need windex or warm water. Comes with 50 chalk labels. Nice touch!! Made in China. 10 pens in all.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on November 18, 2022
Author: Koen
Title: GREAT markers - nice vivid and bright colours - easy to use
Body: I LOVE these markers.  So vivid and vibrant and easy to use.Leave messages on mirrors. Advertise on store windows. Mark wine glasses with names for easy identification.I've used them on mirrors, glass, and paper. They dry quickly and erase super easily on the glass and mirrors.Test your chalkboard before using them because apparently, they're not suitable for all types of boards.Shake well, pump against a paper repeatedly until the nib absorbs the ink. Same instructions to reactivate if the nib runs dry after a period of not using them.The lids can be a bit tight and might need a good 'pull' to get them off - caution there!! I've had ink splash out onto me. Easily removed from your skin...but clothing...not so much!The enclosed little instruction book is so helpful! Clear tips on how to use the markers, what to do if they dry up, storage tips, erasing tips, suitable surfaces, etc. Way better than figuring all that out on your own if you're new to chalk markers.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on November 3, 2022
Author: It's-Tea-Time
Title: Easy to write, easy to erase
Body: I'm using these erasable chalk markers on the chalkboard calendar I keep in my kitchen. The markers have nice, thick tips - perfect for bold lettering. Just as easy to turn them sideways and use the thinner portion of the tip for smaller details, too. The markers write well, very legible, and they dry quickly. They erase completely with a wipe from a damp cloth. The colors are vibrant, the white is bright, and the markers are easy to store in the box that they came in. They show up really well against a black "chalkboard". They write well, even when I'm writing on an angle (wall calendar). I'm pleased with this set!

This was a good purchase for me and my kids and we will get a lot of use out of these in the future.

I figured ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the harm in writing ON my fridge?!‚Äù I tested in an inconspicuous spot, left it for a while, and realized I don‚Äôt even need a wet cloth for removal! These markers are essentially dry erase markers on my smooth surface refrigerator! If you plan on attempting this, I highly recommend avoiding doing it on a white or textured surface unless you have an inconspicuous area you don‚Äôt mind ‚Äúruining‚Äù if it doesn‚Äôt work out. These markers make me want to draw on all of our black appliances now!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Okay Markers, Have Some Problems. Long Review but Read Carefully Before Buying
Body: These markers are a good value and came in nice colors, but I had several problems with them. I am optimistically giving it 3 stars but my view could change if more problems arise, since there are already quite a few. The problems:1. two of the markers came funky, they weren't right and the ink was really thin, not opaque. the tips were already partially colored when I opened them, before they were primed, so I'm assuming whatever compounds start in them that you are supposed to shake up had already leaked into the tip before being mixed, and now the marker will never be right. (I was still able to use one since the level of translucence gave me highlights and lowlights, making it useful for certain types of art)2. the very tips of the chisel tip end don't seem to allow ink out. to try and get a fine line you have to try and write on the side of the tip, and the ink won't always come out properly. The flat part of the chisel works fine.3. I bought the 3mm fine tip, as I had one fine tip marker already from somewhere else, and thought it would be the right size- wrong! Either the marker I had before ran small or (likely) these run a little big. Not for fine lines, or fine writing, especially with the chisel tip problem4. My favorite color was perfect in my initial test, where I made a single mark to see how it would look, but when I went to use it for real, no ink would come out! I tried and tried, because I could see ink flowing into the sides of the tip, just not the end. I tried shaking it, pressing it, pumping it, even setting it upside-down (p.s. don't do that ink will be everywhere) and nothing would come out when I went to actually use it, despite flowing out when I pumped or turned it upsidedown. I turned the tip around to chisel thinking maybe that would work. it did for about a day, but now that ink is no longer flowing through (because the tip in the marker won't allow ink through) and the ink previously in the chisel tip has gone dry, it will not make a mark. the marker is useless, which is sad.5. the lighter colors are a bit more sheer than I would have liked. I wish they were a little more opaque when dried, so I didn't have to go over the lines again and again.So yeah. I probably should have given them 2 stars instead of 3 but I really liked the array of colors and the price, and the ones that did work made nice art. Not so good for writing fine but whatever I'll find a finer tip chalk marker for that.

Author: AM Sinclair
Title: Great liquid chalk pens
Body: Wonderful pens, super easy to use and was able to do some Christmas window decorations with these. Can be a bit fiddly (runs if glass is too cold and chalk lifts if try to go over dried areas (need to dot on instead)) once you get use to them they're great and really easy to clean off.Only complaint is the colors, with the blues i found that there's not much difference in the color of the dark and medium pens, but the range of colors itself  is good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
Author: Suze C
Title: My brand new box of markers came prepackaged with empty, ink-free markers!!
Body: I unboxed the markers, grabbed the first one out of the box, and shook that marker for a solid minute or two. I spent another 3 minutes gently applying pressure to the tip of the marker in a futile attempt to get the ink to flow into the tip. After realizing I have better things to waste time on, I finally gave up on it & grabbed another marker. This time, the second marker sounded completely different when I shook it AND, it only took minimal effort/pressure to get the ink to flow into the tip! So yeah, the markers that actually contain ink seem great, but it also seems like a bit of a waste of money when they arrive brand new, but devoid of the single, actual reason you bought them for in the first place (colorful ink to make pretty things). Not cool!

A suggestion for those who buy them is not to shake them more than twice and press the tip a little, repeat it until you see the tip is soaking, otherwise it will literally make all the ink come out of its down.**I wanted to put a photo but the seller did not give me the option.***-------Edit: no pintes tus muros/pared porque la pintura nunca saldra!!!Son muy bonitos, los colores brillantes. En la foto no se aprecian lo suficiente pero wn realidad son muy n√≠tidos los colores. Lo unico que no me gusto gue que dos de ellos se me vaciaron al abrirlo (color brown y azul) el color caf√© viene roto pues no deja de escurrir pintura. Una sugerencia para quienes los compren es no agitarlos m√°s de dos veces y presionar un poco la punta repetirlo hasta que se vea la punta se esta empapando, de lo contrario hara que literalmente toda la tinta se salga de su plumon.**Queria adjuntar fotos pero no me permitio el vendedor**

Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 29, 2019
Author: Dave
Title: Great value and selection of colours
Body: My wife gets through a lot of coloured markers in her job as a trainer. This Chalkola box contains 30 chalk pens for writing on pretty much any surface. On non-absorbent surfaces such as blackboards and whiteboards the ink is removeable with a damp cloth. On paper and card the ink is permanent making these pens highly versatile. They even write on glass as you can see from the attached photo.The pens are activated by pressing on the nib to start the ink flow. This is a great feature as you can easily restart the ink flow should they dry up a little. The colours are rich and varied and the ink when dry feels just like chalk. 30 pens for ¬£20 is an absolute steal and the selection of colours is fabulous.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021

Title: Great
Body: These are great pens! I've been using chalk markers for years on a black calendar "whiteboard" and I have the hardest time finding colors that will show up on the blackboard. A lot of the chalk markers that I buy are either too light, don't show, or the tip is so large that I can't fill in my calendar. This are not like that. The show up vibrantly and the tips can be flipped to change size. Plus, I love that I have so many color choices.

Title: Stunning quality colors
Body: A friend recommended Chalkola brand chalk markers to me, raving about the color quality and she was so right! They are stunningly vibrant and like nothing I had used before! They are a thick liquid and will bleed through normal paper, so it is better to use heavy cardstock, glossy paper or posterboard. We had the most fun using it for posterboard. Just be sure to give it enough time to dry if you used thicker sections of color, and do NOT out your hands through it until then either or you will have a mess on you, the project, and your crying child.... Trust me! üò¢ These were great for our art projects but be sure to prime all the chalk colors you intend to use BEFORE you start. That way you don't have to keep stopping just shake, push the marker tip, and get it started right in the middle of your creative process.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
Author: melanie
Title: Colors are brilliant
Body: I decorate a chalkboard that sits by my front door and I do seasonal design. The colors are brilliant and this provides great coverage. I paint my chalkboards with this liquid marker. By simply using an old piece of cardboard I press down gently on the tip of the marker allowing the chalk to make a paint palate.  I then use either a sponge or a paintbrush depending on the look I want to achieve. Please see clouds versus sunflowers versus solid fill.  The tips of these markers are also fine enough to write with, please see scripture passage. The chalk dries quickly so you need to do just a small amount at a time. I TYPICALLY do a new design every month,  So far these chalkboard markers have created 3 full designs and there is still plenty of chalkboard paint in them.  This chalkboard faces due South in the state of Florida so after about 3 weeks the colors begin fading. This chalkboard is protected from direct water source however it is subject to high humidity. I will definitely purchase these markers again and I'm looking forward to trying the metallic.

It'd be useful for beginners or just people who aren't sure what their art style is but it isn't a match for me.

Title: Perfectos para crear peque√±as obras de arte, o simplemente apuntar cosas en la pizarra.
Body: Me han gustado mucho estos rotuladores de tiza l√≠quida. Normalmente los uso para escribir en una pizarra grande que tengo en la cocina, para hacer la lista de la compra, las tareas pendientes y para que dibujen mis hijos de 2 y 4 a√±os. A veces tambi√©n los usamos para pintar los cristales de la casa y decorar el sal√≥n o el cuarto, y son perfectas para la pizarra reversible de los ni√±os, tanto para la parte blanca, como para la parte negra.Prefiero usar este tipo de rotuladores porque no ensucian tanto como las tizas normales, que lo dejan todo lleno de polvo. Adem√°s los colores son m√°s vivos y m√°s definidos, y los dibujos quedan much√≠simo mejor.La caja incluye 30 rotuladores de tiza de punta reversible (redonda y plana).Adem√°s incluye 50 etiquetas adhesivas negras para pegar donde queramos y escribirlas o dibujar con los rotuladores. En nuestro caso las usamos para los botes de cristal de la cocina, y le da un toque original y muy vintage.Para que el rotulador se recargue, como indico en el v√≠deo, hay que agitar antes y en vertical presionar varias veces la punta hab√≠a abajo, y veremos c√≥mo la tinta va hacia la punta, permitiendo as√≠ la escrituraEl color es borrable siempre y cuando pintemos sobre una superficie no porosa, es decir, una pizarra, cristal, cer√°mica, azulejos, etc... Si por el contrario lo hacemos sobre una superficie porosa, pueden quedar restos a la hora de intentar eliminarlo (madera, cart√≥n, papel, tela,..).Por ponerle una pega, es un poco sucio darle la vuelta a la punta, ya que lo tienes que hacer con los dedos.La relaci√≥n calidad precio me parece estupenda comparada con otros productos similares.El precio podr√≠a ser menor, pero sale a poco menos de un euro cada rotulador tomando como referencia el precio actual, en mi opini√≥n bastante econ√≥mico si le vas a dar buen uso.El paquete lleg√≥ en la fecha estimada sin incidencias.Espero haberte sido √∫til!

I'll just have to practice more and have more patience letting colors dry before going over it or near it with a different color so they don't run together or wipe off the other color.

Author: sweet colleen
Title: Difficult (but not impossible) to remove.
Body: It's not IMPOSSIBLE to remove? I did finally erase it by using a magic eraser and windex with vinegar? But I also ended up taking off some of the blackboard paint as well. There's no doubt the chalk markers LOOK really fantastic. And if you're an adult wanting more of a clean, artistic look to a menu board or something and you're ok with a multi-step removal process involving windex and vinegar? These things are worth it.But if you're just messing around with your kids or whatever and you want to be able to wipe it off easily (or more importantly, you want your kids to be able to wipe it off themselves with water), I'd recommend just going with old school, regular chalk.

Title: Buenos colores, lo esperado
Body: 30 marcadores por 30‚Ç¨ (a 1‚Ç¨ cada unidad). Al no ser un producto "de marca" quiz√° esperar√≠a un precio m√°s bajo, aunque por lo que he visto todos se venden m√°s o menos al mismo.üü£ Cuenta con "punta reversible", es decir, podemos quitarla y darle la vuelta. Cada lado tiene una forma distinta, encontramos tanto punta redonda como biselada.üü£ Su uso es bastante sencillo, como los rotuladores de este estilo. Agitamos y presionamos la punta para que esta se llene de tinta. Una vez impregnada, podemos deslizarlo con normalidad.Son v√°lido para multitud de superficies: cristal, pizarra, pl√°stico, metal, etc.En resumen: Por 30‚Ç¨ obtenemos 30 marcadores de multitud de colores y aptos para la mayor√≠a de superficies. Date: Reviewed in Spain on December 20, 2020
Author: ‚≠ê¬°Magia Pura!‚≠ê
Title: Tanto para superficies no porosas como pizarras blancas o cristal como para porosas como papel
Body: Hola a todos y a todas, este producto es un conjunto de treinta rotuladores que valen tanto para pintar en superficies no porosas como pizarras blancas o ventanas en las cuales luego se pueden limpiar f√°cilmente con un pa√±o o en superficies porosas en la que quedar√° de forma permanente. Incluye cincuenta etiquetas negras con distintas formas para poder escribir sobre ellas.Lo primero, antes de usarlo hay que agitar cada rotulador durante unos segundos y luego apretar la punta. Luego hay que presionar la punta sobre alguna superficie para poder empezar a dibujar. Con dos de ellos me ha pasado que la punta se me ha salido del rotulador, aunque luego la he vuelto a poner sin problema y no ha causado ning√∫n desastre en plan que se saliera la pintura del rotulador.Los hemos usado en casa con los peque√±os especialmente en pizarras blancas y les ha mantenido entretenidos. Tal y como pone en la descripci√≥n, se borra perfectamente es este tipo de superficie. Tambi√©n las hemos usado en papel y su resultado es como el de un rotulador convencional. Hice la prueba sobre cristal y el resultado ha sido buena, queda el color bien definido y luego se limpia f√°cilmente.La presentaci√≥n es correcta, aunque mejorable, ya que no vienen en un estuche r√≠gido sino en una cajita negra en negro con toques de colores llamativos y con un precinto.

Date: Reviewed in Spain on December 15, 2020
Author: Familia C.G.
Title: Rotuladores de buena calidad
Body: Vienen 30 rotuladores, me recuerdan bastante a los cl√°sicos POSCA, ya que al igual que ellos son de pintura a base de agua. Cuando te llegan puedes ver que la punta es blanca ya que est√°n sin estrenar, para comenzar a utilizarlos tienes que agitarlos un poco para que la pintura y el agua se mezclen bien, ponerlos sobre el papel como si fueses a pintar y apretar un poco para que la punta se meta hacia dentro y as√≠ comience a bajar la pintura. La punta es fina (de 1 mil√≠metro) por lo que para dibujos con mucho detalle o trabajos de precisi√≥n son perfectos.Pintan muy bien y los colores son bonitos, especialmente si pintas sobre negro ya que resaltan much√≠simo m√°s. Se pueden utilizar sobre superficies no porosas como vidrio o pizarra y despu√©s se puede borrar sin que quede la marca. En la caja adem√°s de los 30 rotuladores viene un paquete con etiquetas adhesivas de color negro, estupendas para poner los nombres de una forma bonita en los regalos de navidad.En general est√°n bien, hay much√≠simos colores y muy variados, pintan bien y el precio es bastante asequible si los comparamos con los POSCA que es lo m√°s similar que creo que hay en el mercado, aunque obviamente tampoco es la misma calidad. Recomendables.

Title: Great product

Date: Reviewed in Spain on January 1, 2021
Author: Carlos
Title: Funcionan muy bien, son ideales para pizarras, pero tambi√©n para papel
Body: Son 30 rotuladores de distintos colores, ideales para escribir, dibujar o pintar en superficies no porosas, como pizarras, cristales, espejos, etc. En estas superficies, lo que escribas, o pintes, luego se puede borrar con un cl√≠nex o un pa√±o h√∫medo.Antes de usarlos hay que agitarlos en posici√≥n horizontal, luego hay presionar varias veces la punta del rotulador hasta que salga la tinta.He probado todos los rotuladores y funcionan todos bien, he realizado un dibujo en la mesa de cristal de mi escritorio, se puede ver en algunas de las fotos que he hecho. Est√°n muy bien porque son muchos colores diferentes.Tambi√©n se pueden usar en superficies porosas, como en papel, en estos casos la tinta se seca en unos segundos y ya no se puede borrar.Incluye adem√°s 50 etiquetas negras de 8 formas distintas (rectangulares, ovaladas, etc.). Son ideales para etiquetar o enumerar cajas, tarros o recipientes. Las etiquetas m√°s grandes, las rectangulares, miden 8,5 x 5 cm. Como las etiquetas no son porosas, lo que se escriba en ellas tambi√©n se puede borrar con un cl√≠nex o un pa√±o h√∫medo.

Date: Reviewed in Spain on December 20, 2020
Author: JOSE M. and family
Title: Mucha variedad de colores, limpios y precisos
Body: Excelente pack de rotuladores de tiza l√≠quida, con un total de 30 colores donde elegir, ideales para realizar todo tipo de manualidades.Estos rotuladores se pueden utilizar en superficies como cristales, metales y por supuesto pizarras, gracias a su punta extrafina 1mm podremos conseguir un resultado mucho m√°s detallado que con cualquier otro rotulador.La diferencia con las tizas es que adem√°s de ser m√°s f√°ciles de utilizar y de borrar, bastar√° una bayeta humedecida o una simple toallita para borrar si tenemos que rectificar y sobre todo son mucho m√°s limpios evitando cualquier tipo de polvo en suspensi√≥n.Recomiendo agitarlo contundentemente antes de utilizarlo, luego habr√° que presionar un poco la punta sobre la superficie para que la pintura empiece a salir siempre con un poco de cuidado para que la punta no se quede dentro del rotulador.Se agradece que se suministra con pegatinas tipo pizarra para poderlas utilizar en botes, tuppers, tazas, o cualquier objeto que se quiera personalizar, aunque tambi√©n nos hubiese gustado que se incluyera algunas plantillas, con las propias letras o algunas formas que le hubieran servido de ayuda a los peques de la casa, pero sin duda, los rotuladores son de calidad y ofrecen bastante variedad de colores.

Date: Reviewed in Spain on December 15, 2020
Author: üÜÉüÖ¥üÜÇüÜÇüÖ∞
Title: Ideales para realizar decoraciones en todas las superficies.
Body: Dentro de su caja vienen los 30 rotuladores de punta fina de 1 mm y 25 recuadros con dos plantillas cada uno.Me hubiera gustado que las plantillas no hubieran estado repetidas, porque al final solo vienen unas 7 figuras.Los colores son amplios casi todos pasteles, son muy manejables porque su grosor es normal, y se adaptan perfectamente a la mano.Antes de usarlos solo tienes que bombear la punta hasta que se impregne totalmente.Lo bonito de estos rotuladores, que puedes plasmar el dibujo en cualquier superficie y borrarlo con agua f√°cilmente. Yo lo uso en estas fechas para decorar los cristales con motivos navide√±os, junto con otros que tengo de mayor grosor. tiene una escritura muy bonita y fina.La verdad, que me han gustado mucho.

Title: 30 rotuladores de tiza l√≠quida
Body: Es el primer producto de estas caracter√≠sticas que veo con tantos colores, y sobretodo a este precio.Aqui os muestro como pintan tanto en pizarra negra como en cristal.Debo decir que detr√°s de la caja hay una leyenda donde se muestran los 30 colores, y que algunos son complicados de ubicar ya que el rotulador no se parece en nada al color que aparece en la caja.Tambi√©n decir que ha habido un par de ellos que solo usarlos para hacer la foto se les ha hundido la punta. supongo que son unas pinzas podr√© sacarla, pero no estoy segura.El producto en s√≠ est√° bien, pero hay que tener en cuenta estas "cositas".

Body: Es un verdadero espect√°culo dibujar con ellos sobre el cristal, si te lo preparas bien puedes crear verdaderas obras de arte, los colores son muy vivos y no te faltar√°n tonalidades. Decorar o escribir sobre una vitrina, un ventanal o espejos es lo ideal, sobre pizarras negras quedar√° espectacular, todo lo que hagas resaltar√° una burrada. Sobre estas superficies es muy facil la limpieza, no los he probado sobre otras, pero con agua y un trapo vas sobrada, no dejan rastro. Dale a los ni√±os una superficie acristalada para que se entretengan y disfrutar√°n de lo lindo.Estos colores de tiza l√≠quida son bastante buenos y se ven de lujo. No se si existe buena relaci√≥n entre su calidad y su precio, es dif√≠cil decirlo, pero quiz√°s √©ste √∫ltimo sea su tal√≥n de Aquiles.

Author: JokeR
Title: Si vais a pintar mucho, entonces genial.
Body: Un pack perfecto para decoraci√≥n, son 30 rotuladores de cristal f√°cil de limpiar y que dar√°n un toque a tus cristales esta navidad o simplemente para escribir algo sobre cristal.Hasta aqu√≠ todo muy bonito, pero el problema es que estos rotuladores para utilizarlos debes agitarlos y apretar la punta para que empiece a salir la tinta, una vez se empapa ya puedes dibujar, el problema, es que si vas a utilizarlo para multiples cosas y consigues gastarlo perfecto, pero si solamente es para unas peque√±as cosas y tu intenci√≥n es utilizarlo el a√±o que viene, OJO, porque muy posiblemente este seco y no consigas que vuelva a pintar.Eso mismo me ha pasado a mi este a√±o, tenia varios rotuladores de este tipo y al ir a utilizarlos se habia quedado la punta seca y aunque seguia existiendo tinta, ya no era el trazo tan fluido.Asi que como recomendaci√≥n, agita los rotuladores que creas que vas a utilizar.Este pack solo lo recomiendo si creeis que vais a pintar bastante, o vais a pintar a menudo, si la idea es decorar algo para una fiesta y luego pasara un a√±o hasta la pr√≥xima vez, mejor optar por solo un color o 2 que los venden sueltos.Saludos.

Title: Perfectos para un mont√≥n de materiales
Body: Estos rotus est√°n fenomenal para realizar manualidades por las superficies en las que puedes pintar con ellos: pizarra, piedra, cristal, loza, etc. y tienen un buen precio.He utilizado m√°s rotuladores de esta marca y todos me han salido buenos, no me han dado mayor problema y les he utilizado bastante.En el vidrio que es el uso principal que les hemos dado quedan muy bonitos y bastante brillantes.Lo m√°s remarcable es que se limpian con facilidad con un papel mojado, toallita o bayeta.Lo √∫nico que mejorar√≠a es el envase en el que vienen. Creo que ser√≠a m√°s pr√°ctico que viniesen en bolsa tipo estuche o en caja m√°s robusta para que nos aguante el uso. La caja es algo endeble para un almacenamiento largo.
